Quick move-in!

Hi!
A fully furnished apartment at Frederiks Brygge is available for sublease due to an exchange program from September 10th to around January 15th (dates are negotiable).
It‚Äôs 66 m¬≤ with one bedroom, kitchen, living room, two balconies, and a bathroom. Includes washing machine and dryer.

Lovely location with access to the waterfront and a newly opened metro station (Enghave Brygge Metro) just 300m away. Close to a grocery store, gym, Fisketorvet (shopping center üíÉüèΩüíÉüèΩ), and Beta Boulders right across the street!

title: Rummelig 2 v√¶relses lejlighed
description:
Om boligen:

Denne sk√∏nne og optimerede lejlighed starter med at byde dig velkommen i en separat entr√© med plads til at h√¶nge overt√∏jet. Fra entr√©en kommer du ind i det lyse k√∏kken-alrum, som er et l√¶kkert fuldt udstyret hvidt k√∏kken med k√∏le-/fryseskab, ovn, kogeplader, emh√¶tte og opvaskemaskine samt god opbevaringsplads. Stuen er godt indrettet med optimale anvendelsesmuligheder, hvor der veludnyttet kan etableres b√•de en sofa- og spiseafdeling. Stuen munder ud i en stor vestvendt terrasse, hvor sol og frisk luft kan nydes og hvor du har kig ud over det n√¶rliggende villaomr√•de. Fra opholdsomr√•det er der adgang til et stort sovev√¶relse, hvor der er plads til den store seng. Entr√©en giver ogs√• adgang til badev√¶relset, som er opf√∏rt i et tidl√∏st l√¶kkert design, rummeligt og med separat bruseniche og hertil b√•de med vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler.

 Hele lejligheden er desuden installeret med gulvvarme, som kan justeres individuelt i de enkelte rum. 

Bem√¶rk venligst, at billederne kan v√¶re fra en anden bolig, hvorfor indretning, beliggenhed og udsigt kan variere. Materialevalg og kvalitet er den samme for alle boliger i ejendommen. Se plantegningen for indretningen af denne bolig.

 

Om Banehaverne:

 

 Banehaverne er tegnet af det prisvindende arkitektfirma Sweco Architects, som har √∏nsket at skabe en ejendom med fokus p√• f√¶llesskab og livskvalitet.

Ejendommen rummer i alt 16 bygninger (inkl. r√¶kkehuse), der centrerer sig omkring smukke g√•rdrum med legearealer og rolige opholdszoner. I alt kommer her 6 unikke g√•rdrum, som forbindes af en lang sti, som snor sig gennem hele komplekset og ender i det store aktivitetsomr√•de Kilen.

 

Omr√•det:

 

 Omr√•det omkring Banehaverne byder p√• en harmonisk blanding af natur, kultur og byliv.

Her er storsl√•et natur ved b√•de vand og skov, gode skoler og daginstitutioner samt et v√¶ld af fritidstilbud inden for b√•de friluftsliv, idr√¶t og kreative aktiviteter.

Alt sammen er med til at skabe de bedste foruds√¶tninger for en hverdag, der glider nemt og er rig p√• sjove og sp√¶ndende muligheder.

Banehaverne nyder godt af deres strategiske placering t√¶t p√• K√∏benhavn. Med kun 10 min. gang til Glostrup Station og nem adgang til motorvejsnetv√¶rket er K√∏benhavn t√¶t p√•. Du kan nyde godt af den korte afstand til K√∏benhavn, mens du stadig kan tr√¶kke dig tilbage til den rolige atmosf√¶re i Glostrup/Br√∏ndby om aftenen.

Ved at s√¶nke bygningsh√∏jden i det sydvestlige hj√∏rne optimeres lysindfald og udsigt for alle beboere. Ejendommen er desuden karakteriseret ved det store, √•bne g√•rdrum, der er inddelt i zoner med specifikke behov for √∏je, hvadend det er leg og bev√¶gelse eller mere private zoner til ro og afslapning. I Lavetten f√•r du en bolig i et kvalitets- og energivenligt byggeri. Som eksempler kan n√¶vnes klimatilpasset regnvandsh√•ndtering, kildesortering, lavenergiruder overalt samt hvidevarer i minimum energiklasse A+. Lavetten er en s√•kaldt lavenergibygning, der efterlever alle krav til isolering, ventilation og t√¶thed i energim√¶rkningens A2020. Vi er tilmed 10% bedre. Listen over kvalitetsl√∏sninger er lang og indbefatter desuden elevator til d√∏ren (dog ikke til de √∏verste dobbeltlejligheder), praktisk teknikskakt og mulighed for leje af p-plads i k√¶lderen.

                                      Lokalomr√•det
              √òrestad Syd   er K√∏benhavns nye gr√∏nne bydel omgivet af natur og vand - og med en god blanding af boliger, erhverv, uddannelse og kultur. Omr√•det er kendetegnet ved sammenst√∏det mellem moderne arkitektur og Kalvebod F√¶lleds vidtstrakte natur. Kvarteret er i konstant udvikling og de tusindvis af nye beboere er med til at g√∏re √òrestad Syd til en bydel fuld af liv og aktivitet. Selvom den fredede natur ligger lige i baghaven, er man som beboer i √òrestad Syd meget t√¶t p√• K√∏benhavns midte og puls. P√• cykel eller med metro kan du v√¶re p√• Christianshavn p√• 11 minutter eller p√• N√∏rreport St. p√• 14 minutter. I √òrestad Syd har du dog adgang til alt hvad hjertet beg√¶rer, uden at forlade kvarteret. Foruden den storsl√•ede natur, har du Danmarks st√∏rste shopping center, Field‚Äôs, store kulturoplevelser i Royal Arena, caf√©liv, sportsklubber, skoler, b√∏rnehaver og indk√∏bsmuligheder lige uden for d√∏ren.

description:

title: Bright room in large flat, near CBS
description:
I am renting out a bedroom for 1 person, in a fully furnished 125m2 spacious flat with CPR registration, where the rent is including; CPR, furniture, heating, water, electricity and wifi. 

The area is quite and within convenient walking distance to grocery shopping, gym, parks, universities and public transport.

You will be staying with friendly female academic roommates in their 20s, therefore we are preferably searching for a female tenant, to join the flat too.
 
The flat fully furnished and has a large living room, 2 hallways, balcony, kitchen, bathroom with a bathtub. In the kitchen you will find all necessary utensils, including a dish washer.

The room has a desk, chair, lights, a large bed, drawers and hangers.

On bike it takes about 10 minutes to CBS and 20 minutes to the city centre. Furthermore there is great public transport connection by 24 bus or train from 2 nearby stations. 

Feel free to write me with any questions you might have and we can arrange for a visit to the flat in person or via video, if you are not yet in Copenhagen.

Located on Nyelandsvej, which stretches from Falkoner All√© near Frederiksberg Center, offering a wide variety of shopping and dining options, to the elegant Femte Juni Plads.

title: Nice furnished room near Dyssegaard Station
description:
I rent out a nice furnished room in a shareable flat. 
The flat is newly restaurated with new windows, floors, heating radiators, bathroom and kitchen.
I live on the ground floor and this flat has its own independent entrance on second floor.
You will have to share flat  with 2 other roomies. 
There is a  kitchen and seperate area for common dining.
There is a bathroom with washingmashine.
Its very near Dyssegaard s-station. 
To the center of Copenhagen it takes approx 12 min by train. To DTU it takes 20 min by bike. Further there are busses going to Lyngby very near the appartment.
You will have to share cleaning duties with other roomies. by cleaning common areas every second or third week.

The rent is including heating, eletricity, water and internet.

title: Furnished apartment in the best part of Amagerbro (Duration: 5 months)
description:
We‚Äôre renting out our apartment while our family set off on a little adventure. The apartment is available from December 1st, 2024, to the end of April 2025, and it‚Äôll come fully furnished.

The apartment is a cozy, two-story duplex flat in the best part of Amagerbro, just around the corner from Christianshavn and Islands Brygge. The apartment is part of a newly built residential area close to multiple grocery stores, the university, multiple different gyms (Spinning, CrossFit, yoga studios), cafes, and a dip in the harbor!

Downstairs, there‚Äôs a nice kitchen and a comfy living room, and upstairs, you‚Äôll find three bedrooms (or two bedrooms and an office) and a spacious bathroom. Plus, we‚Äôve got a small terrace and direct access to a lovely courtyard. 

All appliances are available, incl. a washer and a dryer, dishwasher, coffee machine, kettle, and so on. The home is kid-friendly and we provide baby gates for the stairs. 
 
We prioritize renting out to couples or families who can make our home their home for the entire duration of the lease (5 months). We will create a subletting contract and share it with our landlord according to the rules and regulations for the property. 

Please reach out if you are interested in renting our home.

Welcome to MIDGAARD!
MIDGAARD ‚Äã‚Äãis a co-living community in √òrestaden, Copenhagen with 206 studio apartments, where you get your own kitchen and bathroom. The apartments offer a small compact kitchen with included kitchen essentials incl. stove, extractor hood and a small fridge with freezer compartment. The apartments are not furnished but do have integrated closets for clothes and storage.
The property offers great communal facilities. Among other things; common kitchen, laundry room and a very big rooftop terrace with a fantastic view of F√¶lleden.
MIDGAARD ‚Äã‚Äãis located on Else Alfelts Vej next to the Promenade along F√¶lleden, which is reserved for pedestrians and cyclists. ‚ÄúByens Hus‚Äù, which is to be a community center with many facilities for the whole area, is right next door. The nearest supermarket and Metro station is 500 meters from the property.
In MIDGAARD you live close to the city, and yet you can enjoy the nature from the rooftop terrace and in the nearby area. You can go to the local caf√©s, or you can go for a run in green surroundings.

- You are required to be enrolled to a school or university to live in the apartment.

title: Amazing Light Family or Expat Apartment Centrally Located in Osterbro
description:
Amazing apartment right in between the Osterbro lakes and the green Faeldeparken. Centrally located with public transportation, supermarkets, restaurants, and parking this apartment really has  everything you could dream of.  From a large elevator, to new kitchen, two bathrooms, a party room, a large storage room, and even a basketball court, soccer pitch, and children‚Äôs playground right in your back yard. 

We have outgrown our wonderful home and looking for a stable, non-smoking, young family or expat couple to take care of it for the next two years. 

More Details help you understand how unique this apt really is. 

Bedrooms: 	
3 actual Bedrooms (All with built in cabinets)

Bathrooms: 	
2 Bathrooms (Both with Showers and one with built in changing table) 

Kitchen / Living:
The kitchen and living are separate to the aforementioned. 

Terrace/balcony:		
Private 5 sqm terrace (South Facing) 

Windows: 
All windows (6) are floor to ceiling French Balconies giving enormous amount of light. The aptartment is on the second highest floor ensuring light all day and any season.

Elevator:
Large elevator with access direct from street level up to the apartment. The elevator is large enough to hold a large baby wagon plus 2 or 3 people comfortably.

Other:		
Private Storage Room, a Bike Room, room to store your winter/summer tires, and even a party room (seating up to 50 people). 

Back Garden:	
Large courtyard with a ‚Ä¶Basketball Half court, Mini Soccer pitch, Children Playground with slides, swings, sandboxes etc., Open picnic tables and grills, Rabbits, birds, and cats ;) 

Location:	
Central but quiet area with large park 50m from apt. and the four lakes 50m from apt. 

Parking:	
In the last three years I have always been able to get a parking spot on the street no matter the time of day. The most I have ever had to walk from my parking spot to the house is 400 meters. This is a smaller parking zone where few residents have cars. 

Transportation:	
Nearby public transport access with 10 min to City Center & 25 min to Airport

title: Bright furnished room in Copenhagen until 31. December 2024
description:
I am looking to sublet my room in the centre of Copenhagen until the end of December 2024. The room is fully furnished (see pictures) and has two large windows that allow for a lot of sunlight. The apartment has a small hallway, a kitchen and bathroom that you will share with your roommates. 
The apartment is located less than 5 min walking to the 150S at Rigshospitalet Syd that takes you to Norreport or directly to DTU. You can also reach the city center in less then 5 min by bike or by taking the M3 line from Trianglen.
You will be living right next to the beautiful lakes as well as the F√¶lledparken green area. If you like to go out, you can reach N√∏rrebro with its great bars and restaurants in 10 min walking. 
You will be sharing a flat with my two roommates Clara and Jakob, who are both working in Copenhagen.
The rent of 6510 DKK already includes Wi-Fi and utilities. 
If you are interested, feel free to shot me a message here on BoligPortal.
Best,
Steffen

description:
New renovated furnished apartment located on Toldbodgade, with a beautiful view over the water towards the opera house. Private parking space in front of the building can be rented for DKK 3.000 per month. 

The apartment consists of a hall with built in wardrobe, bathroom with shower, large bedroom with built in wardrobe, large living room in connection with luxury kitchen with wine fridge, steam oven, regular oven, cooker hood, Microwave, dishwasher, fridge, freezer and workplace smartly arranged in a cupboard with worktop, space for printer etc.

The apartment is beautiful furnished and is a must see with is quality, perfect location on the waterfront close to everything Copenhagen has to offer.

There is lift in the building.

The apartment can only be rented by companies, embassies and expats.

The apartment can be rented for a year, with a possible extension, if this is in alignment with the landlord's plans.

title: Boliger i skandinavisk design med lys, luft og plads til udeliv

title: Classic plus studio in Nido Bryggen
description:
I am renting out my apartment as I will soon move to a new one. It's a 28 sqm studio located in a residence (Nido Bryggen) for students and young professionals, at only 400m from Islands Brygge metro station (5min walk), and 600m from Rema1000 (8min walk). The residence has a laundry room with washing machines and dryers, parking for bikes and a gym that is free to use. There are also common areas and shared kitchens for each floor. 
The monthly rent is 10,000DKK. You need to pay 20,000DKK deposit + 1st month rent before moving in. 
I am looking for someone who can move from the 30th of September or beginning of October. Please feel free to contact me for more information or if you wish to see the apartment. Thanks!

description:

title: Velkommen til F√¶lledby
description:
F√¶lledby

Her opf√∏rer vi 71 lejligheder i holdbare materialer med udsigt til Amager F√¶lleds smukke natur. F√¶lledby er et byudviklingsprojekt beliggende i K√∏benhavn, hvor der sigtes mod at skabe en ny og sp√¶ndende bydel.


Boligtyper

Boligerne C6¬† byder p√• en r√¶kke forskellige boligtyper fra to til fem v√¶relser, som alle er opf√∏rt af kvalitetsmaterialer. Alle boliger f√•r egne altaner - eller terrasser i stueetagerne - med udsigt til b√•de naturen og livet i de lokale gader omkring bygningen. Her skaber vi rammen om den hjemlige hygge med l√¶kre lysindfald og en gennemt√¶nkt disponering af rum og inventar, der passer til b√•de sm√• og store familier eller til singlelivet.

Infrastruktur

F√¶lledby vil v√¶re godt forbundet med resten af K√∏benhavn via offentlig transport, cykelstier og veje. Dette g√∏r det nemt for beboerne at pendle og bev√¶ge sig rundt i byen.
Omr√•det ligger kun 10 minutters cykeltur fra Islands Brygge med sit popul√¶re kulturhus og havnebad. Herfra er du hurtigt inde p√• Fisketorvet eller i K√∏dbyen med sine mange spisesteder og specialbutikker. Du kan ogs√• tage enten cyklen eller metroen mod nord til musikoplevelser i DR Koncerthuset, eller bes√∏ge Bella Kvarter, som ligger 10 minutters gang mod syd, hvor Bella Arena og Bella Center byder p√• koncerter eller messer i l√∏bet af √•ret som fx den popul√¶re Bogmesse. Tager du et metrostop l√¶ngere mod syd finder du et af K√∏benhavns st√∏rste koncertsteder, Royal Arena, og tager du et stop mere, st√•r du p√• kanten af Kalvebod F√¶lled og et stenkast fra omr√•dets popul√¶re Naturcenter Amager. Herfra str√¶kker Naturpark Amagers √•bne vidder sig langt mod syd og indbyder til lange g√•ture i b√•de eng og skov eller langs vandet.


Forbehold

Vi g√∏r opm√¶rksom p√•, at interi√∏r- og eksteri√∏rbilleder af F√¶lledby og ejendommen C6 er 3D-visualiseringer. 3D-visu - aliseringer tilstr√¶ber at vise bebyggelsen s√• n√∏jagtigt som muligt. Der tages forbehold for, at der p√• disse billeder i salgsmaterialet er gengivet genstande, overflader, materialer, udstyr og indretning, som ikke svarer n√∏jagtigt til det, der leveres. Dette g√∏r sig tillige g√¶ldende for nabobygninger, g√•rdmilj√∏, gangbroer, bel√¶gninger, udend√∏rs inventar mm., idet disse er angivet ud fra foreliggende oplysninger. Der kan ske √¶ndringer i det endelige udtryk, materialevalg og geometri. Bel√¶gninger, tr√¶er og beplantninger vises ikke n√∏dvendigvis som det vil se ud ved afleveringen af boligen, da beplantning har en etableringsperiode, og derfor f√∏rst vil vokse til med √•rene. V√¶sentlige afvigelser kan forekomme blandt andet p√• grund af myndighedskrav og byggesagsbehandling

title: Modern Studio with Loft in the heart of Frederiksberg - For Students
description:
This spacious modern studio  that can accommodate up to 2 people is located at UMEUS Frederiksberg, in the heart of the Frederiksberg hip and classy neighborhood. When staying at UMEUS, you will get access to all the facilities that a student will need during a stay of study.
What‚Äôs inside?
o	Private bathroom with toilet and a separate shower. A large mirror, 1 shelf for storage and hooks for towels and a shower curtain. 
o	Kitchen with oven, fridge, freezer & stove, cabinets with a sink and extractor hood. Prepared with socket for electrical appliances 
o	Loft with bed
o	Working desk (60 cm x 100 cm)
o	3 tall cabinets including shelves, hanger bar and 1 mirror
o	Bed with 2 pull-out drawers, including a mattress and a mattress topper (180 cm x 200 cm)

The studio further comes with wall-mounted shelves, a wall lamp, a hook for a ceiling lamp of your own, blackout curtain and hooks for outerwear. 

On top of that, you will get access to:  
o	Fitness: fully equipped gym included in the rent
o	Rooftop terrace 
o	Laundry room (paid over rent) 
o	Group rooms you can book through our UMEUS app
o	Study hall  
o	Nuuks Plads & Fem√∏ren Metro close by 
o	Community Managers on site to help with all questions
o	Events ‚Äì you can be a part of the social committee & social clubs

About UMEUS Frederiksberg
UMEUS offers student co-living in Copenhagen. Located centrally in the district of Frederiksberg with plenty of opportunities to enjoy an active student life - you can participate in our social clubs, for example our Winter Swimming club, Football club, Creative Club, Urban Garden Club or our Running club. Join our social committee, if you want to arrange and plan social gatherings or help out in our Thursday Bar. Just around the corner you will find caf√©s, restaurants and supermarkets. The lively Rantzausgade and V√¶rnedamsvej are both just around the corner - and did we mention we are right next to CBS?
The heart of UMEUS Frederiksberg is the community: whether you want to cook together or have a movie night, grab a beer or play board games together - this is where it happens.

NOTE! The Studios are for STUDENTS ONLY: You must be between 18 - 30 years old at the time of moving in. At least one of the tenants living in this studio must be registered as student.

All our studios are eligible for housing benefits/boligst√∏tte.

o	Events ‚Äì you can be a part of the social committee & social clubs

About UMEUS Frederiksberg
UMEUS offers student co-living in Copenhagen. Located centrally in the district of Frederiksberg with plenty of opportunities to enjoy an active student life - you can participate in our social clubs, for example our Winter Swimming club, Football club, Creative Club, Urban Garden Club or our Running club. Join our social committee, if you want to arrange and plan social gatherings or help out in our Thursday Bar. Just around the corner you will find caf√©s, restaurants and supermarkets. The lively Rantzausgade and V√¶rnedamsvej are both just around the corner - and did we mention we are right next to CBS?
The heart of UMEUS Frederiksberg is the community: whether you want to cook together or have a movie night, grab a beer or play board games together - this is where it happens.

NOTE! The Studios are for STUDENTS ONLY: You must be between 18 - 30 years old at the time of moving in. At least one of the tenants living in this studio must be registered as student.

All our apartments are eligible for housing benefits/boligst√∏tte.

The property is located very well in √òsterbro, here is a short distance to Metro, S-train and bus. The apartment consists of a bedroom, living room, kitchen, and bathroom, including two balconies. Both options include a furnished apartment with kitchen utensils and various items. There is a sofa bed in the living room with a thick mattress topper that can also be used.

There is a laundry room in the basement and a nice courtyard where bicycles can be stored under a canopy.

The price is 13,000 DKK/month, including utilities and internet. (If the first option is chosen, the price will be 9,500 DKK/month).

description:
Dortheahuset i K√∏benhavns Nordvestkvarter rummer  blandt andet um√∏blerede nyopf√∏rte Small Living boliger. Lejlighederne kan lejes ubegr√¶nset, og du kan tilmed ans√∏ge om boligst√∏tte, n√•r du bor i en af boligerne. S√∏ger du en etv√¶relses bolig t√¶t p√• metrostation og/eller buslinjer, er du velkommen til at kontakte os med henblik p√• en fremvisning.

Obs.: Vi lejer ud efter f√∏rst til m√∏lle princippet, og reserverer derfor ikke lejligheder. 


/H5 Housing A/S

___________________________________

Dortheahuset in Copenhagen's North-West Quarter contains, among other things, unfurnished newly built Small Living homes. The apartments can be rented indefinitely, and you can also apply for housing benefit when you live in one of the apartments. If you are looking for a one-bedroom apartment close to a metro station and/or bus lines, you are welcome to contact us for a viewing. 
The apartment also includes a basement. 

In the building, there is a shared yard with benches to sit and enjoy the sun, shared laundry and a large and spacious roof terrace with sun all day. 

Note: We rent out on a first-come, first-served basis, and therefore do not reserve apartments.

title: Room in modern apartment near canal from 1st October - still available as of 4 September
description:
Hello future roomie :),

We‚Äôre searching for a like-minded person to join our apartment in Teglhomen from 1st October. No students please :).

We are two positive, chill and easy-going roomies (M 31 & F 33) that have been living together for 2 years. Our current awesome roomie is moving out and we‚Äôre searching preferably for a female.

We wish to have a cozy, warm, happy home, with mutual respect and occasional dinner, lunch, breakfast, activity together.

The apartment
The full apartment is 102m with a big living room, close to the canal. The area is lovely.
- 3 min walk to the canal
- 2 min walk to the bus stop and 2 supermarkets. The bus goes to the Central Station in 15 min and biking takes about 15 minutes to the city. 
- The new Metro is 7 min walk and reaches easily to other parts of Copenhagen

There is dishwasher, washing machine and drier. The apartment is well-kept and furnished, however we want to change the style a bit and are currently going through a revamp. There is a nice large balcony.

Your room is 9,8m and can either come completely empty or completely furnished :). You can agree with our current roomie when visiting.

You can see the room outlined in the photo. The financials are:
- Rent: 5900kr (all expenses included - internet)
- Aconto: 254kr heating aconto
- Internet: 100kr

When moving in there will be 1 month prepaid rent and 3 months deposit.

(Pets are not allowed in the building unfortunately.)

About us
Bianca is a 33 yo positive and creative Product Manager, working in the mutual funds industry. Always out for some event, travelling, seeing friends or trying new things, but also needs her space. Her passions are horse riding, going to theatre plays or concerts.

Flo is 31 years old and works in Sales. He is an easygoing and friendly person, living in CPH for 2 years. He enjoys playing rugby and hanging out with friends. At home he likes his personal space and alone time but also enjoys the time with his flatmates.

About you
We want you to be around the same age or mindset, with a happy, positive outlook to life. We‚Äôd like you to be tidy and like to make a cosy home. We expect you to be financially stable and have a job. We'd want you to be quiet during the night time meaning not party every week or have loud music at night time (party room available in the building). Also to respect a closed door but want to hang out together sometimes.

If you'd like to live with us please write a bit about yourself :). If we fit we‚Äôd like to meet you and show you the apartment.

title: 2 beautiful rooms, best location, low tax. For 1 person only or single parent (in shared flat, renting out half of the 120+ sqm)
description:
My good flatmate is moving out, so I seek a new one.

I‚Äôm renting out half of my 120 sqm flat. You will have 2 private rooms (ca 27+8 kvm) plus share kitchen/corridor/bathroom/Attic with me. 

Best location in Greater Copenhagen, Klampenborg. 
Located between a nice beach (we walk in bath robes to the beach) 
and a great forest (you can hear birds and deer from the flat); 
yet, super close to the center of Copenhagen. 

Low council tax, top services. 3 month notice.

Transport possibilities: 
‚Ä¢ Regional-, and S-trains, 13 min. to city. 
‚Ä¢ Bus to Lyngby/DTU ..or scenic bike trip.
‚Ä¢ Easy access to main motorways, so fx 15 min. by car to H√∏rsholm/Science park. 
‚Ä¢ Council provides parking permit, plus one can rent parking spot in the yard cheaply. 
 
Your part of the flat: 
‚Ä¢ A spacious living room with high stucco ceiling. During winter, you can gaze at the sunrise from the windows. 
‚Ä¢ Small bedroom, look into the forest while listening to the birds.

Shared part: kitchen, bathroom, hallway and attic. 
‚Ä¢ The kitchen is practical and contains dishwasher, cooker, fridge & freezer, boiler, and microwave. Plenty of storage space.
‚Ä¢ The modern bathroom is spacious and contains WC, sink, proper shower, some storage, and washing machine. 
‚Ä¢ The hallway has ample hanging and storage room. 
‚Ä¢ The attic belonging to the flat is primarily for drying clothes, but there is also space for storing smaller items. 

The building also has 2 separate green areas that tenants enjoy maintaining, plus a little ‚Äògym‚Äô. 
For guests staying over: within the building, a double-bed room with sea view can be booked.

From whom are you renting: 
I‚Äôm a senior lecturer in interaction design, 
a quiet co-habitant, as well as an amicable, down2earth and forthcoming person. 
I like to have a clear distribution of responsibilities and a clean flat.
If you are moving to the country, I can help you settling in.

Available for: 
‚Ä¢ One person only, or single parent. 
‚Ä¢ Quiet, reliable and responsible. 
‚Ä¢ Steady income (documented). 
‚Ä¢ Proper command of English OR a Scandinavian language. 
‚Ä¢ All genders and ethnicities are of course welcome. 
‚Ä¢ I prefer tenants who can see themselves living here for a lengthy period, 
but also guest researchers who are here for a fixed period. 

Some non-negotiable ground rules: 
‚Ä¢ Full compliance with the regulation/‚Äôhusorden‚Äô of the building (you‚Äôll get a copy, and I can translate). 
‚Ä¢ No pets. 
‚Ä¢ Non-smoker, and no smoking in the building at all. 
‚Ä¢ No loud prolonged music practice. 
‚Ä¢ Rent is always paid on time. 
‚Ä¢ If you destroy something, it should be replaced immediately (or it will be subtracted from the deposit). 
‚Ä¢ Respect for each other‚Äôs rooms, items, etc. 
‚Ä¢ Taking shared responsibilities seriously. 

I look forward to meeting my new flatmate.

Best regards Henrik

description:
Dear all

The room will be available for occupancy from November 1, 2023. You are welcome to come and inspect the apartment, garden and room with the furniture that comes with it. If you want to make use of the Property Portal, we can arrange a visit where you can inspect the room and our shared facilities.  

In a beautiful listed property from 1880 directly by the lakes you can rent a large and brightly furnished room with a view of our lovely large courtyard with apple trees and flower beds, etc. 

The apartment is located on the fourth floor with a secluded 180 degree view of Copenhagen from Frederiksberg and N√∏rrebro all the way to √òsterbro. (See the attached pictures.)

You will live centrally in Copenhagen K close to City Hall Square, Tivoli Gardens and the many good restaurants and caf√©s around Sorte Dams Dosseringen and Nansensgade.  

The apartment is completely renovated in the summer of 2018 with new electrical installations, TV and Internet, a new bathroom, kitchen, etc. At the same time, noise-reducing three-layer windows have been installed, which means that it is very quiet everywhere in the apartment. 

As a tenant of the room, you also get a right to use our new Bosch dishwasher and a Miele washing machine, an attic room of 8 sqm. and a shared drying ceiling of 5. Floor. You also get access to use our locked courtyard with shared football field, garden furniture, bicycle shed and outdoor kitchen, etc. From the room you have access to fast Internet (1,000 M bit) and a number of TV channels. 

"It‚Äôs a great room, size is perfect for one person, and it has a big window letting in lots of sun. The kitchen and bathroom are also top notch, not your typical small, cramped Copenhagen style.

I found the storage space in the attic especially helpful to keep my suitcases in when I wasn‚Äôt using them. Andmost importantly, as I stated, Jens is a fantastic flatmate and human-being; I would recommend this place to anyone looking to live somewhere pleasant and hassle-free. N√∏rre S√∏gade was my home, and I will miss it very much! You will be lucky to live here."

title: Lejebolig i S√∏borg i det idylliske Tinghaven.
description:

S√∏borg byder p√• en masse sk√∏nne naturomr√•der. √ònsker du at tr√¶kke noget frisk luft i smukke rammer, kan du g√∏re det ganske t√¶t p√• dit hjem. Under √©n kilometer fra lejeboligen i S√∏borg finder du n√¶rmeste station, Buddinge Station. Her kan du g√∏re brug af stationens flere muligheder for offentlig transport, der kan bringe dig videre til resten af byen, Sj√¶lland og Danmark.

Som lejer i det idylliske Tinghaven kan du f√• en bolig p√• enten 2, 3 eller 4 v√¶relser, som varierer mellem 78 kvm og 102 kvm. Til hver lejlighed er der en sk√∏n altan.

title: Fantastisk lejlighed i to plan og som nabo til Amalienborg.
description:
I historiske omgivelser n√¶r de kongelige p√• Amalienborg. T√¶t p√• Amaliehaven og Kongens Have kan man leje denne sk√∏nne lejlighed, som nu kan danne en sk√∏n ramme om Deres tilv√¶relse. Her kan man bos√¶tte sig lige ved alle Indre Bys herligheder, mens man dagligt kan nyde synet af kvarterets smukke, gamle historiske bygninger. Her er ejendommen, som lejligheden er en del af, ingen undtagelse, og indenfor matcher boligen i to etager meget klart omgivelserne. De kan se frem til en stue, et sovev√¶relse med walk-in, to badev√¶relser og et k√∏kken/alrum med udgang til egen solrig terrasse p√• ca. 20 kvm.

Fra entr√©en f√∏rer de franske d√∏re os ind i den rummelige stue, hvor sollyset str√∏mmer uhindret ind gennem de h√∏je sm√• sprossede vinduer og danner fine skygger p√• sildebensparketgulvet. Via trappen ned til underetagen m√∏der man k√∏kken/alrummet med samme smukke detaljer, mens k√∏kkenet er opf√∏rt i flotte materialer. 

Fra sovev√¶relset f√•r man direkte adgang til et walk-in, hvor der er god plads til garderoben. De to badev√¶relser fordelt p√• hver sin etage er indrettet i ens stil med naturfarvede klinker, hvidt inventar og en muret bruseniche, mens der p√• det ene badev√¶relse tilmed er en vaskes√∏jle. 

Som en ekstra bonus kan man nyde sommerhalv√•ret p√• din egen hyggelige terrasse, som vender fordelagtigt mod syd√∏st. Herude kan man arrangere havebordet og loungesofa, s√• der b√•de er mulighed for at spise m√•ltiderne under √•ben himmel og slappe af i solen. G√•rden er utrolig rolig og man fornemmer ikke at man er i det indre K√∏benhavn.

title: Exceptionally well located apartment in the first row to Copenhagen's harbor!
description:
Welcome to Havnegade!

Here you will find an apartment in a class of its own, measuring 96 square meters, and is located in the first row to Copenhagen's harbor in what can be described as one of Copenhagen's most central and best locations. This provides an astonishing amenity value.

The apartment has been modernized, and has a stately feel.

You enter a fine entrance hall where there are a place to hang your outerwear or anything else that needs to be put away when you come inside the apartment.

From the entrance you can access a large bathroom with separate shower where you will find a washing machine as well.

From the hallway you will walk into the big living room, where there is plenty of space to place a large dining table and a couch-section. The living room is facing the Copenhagens Habour, and from the windows you have a completely astonishing view. In the other part of the living room the open kitchen appears. Here you have the overview, all the machines and counter space that you need. From the living room and kitchen you can acces a large balcony, which is more or less facing west. Here you can get a lot of hours to get by during the summer (and actually the year around). Next, the apartment has two big bedrooms, one facing the habour and one facing the yard.

This is a fantastic apartment, which is some of the absolute best Copenhagen has to offer.

Beware that the shown expenses for water is not accurate.

title: Charmerende villalejlighed i totalrenoveret funkisvilla fra 1939 med stor delvist overd√¶kket tagterrasse og adgang til havestykke
description:
Vi tilbyder en unik mulighed for at leje en smuk og rummelig villalejlighed p√• 1. sal i vores charmerende funkisvilla fra 1939. Villaen, som tidligere fungerede som l√¶gebolig, er opdelt i to enheder, hvor vi selv bor i stueetagen og dele af k√¶lderen. Hele huset er gennemgribende istandsat med stor omtanke for b√•de funktionalitet og √¶stetik. Med et boligareal p√• 87 m¬≤ fordelt p√• 3 v√¶relser og k√∏kken med spiseplads perfekt for dig, der √∏nsker en lys og rummelig bolig med moderne bekvemmeligheder. Vi er i gang med at genetablere vores b√•de for- og baghave ‚Äì og derved ogs√• indgangen til selve huset, som blev gravet op i forbindelse med etablering af omfangsdr√¶n. I den forbindelse blev den fine forhave ogs√• gravet op, men som vi snarest forventes udbedret.

Tagterrassen mangler ogs√• sidste h√•nd, men er klar med nyt tr√¶gulv, nye plader og overd√¶kning n√•r du flytter ind,

Indretning:
Du tr√¶der indenfor i hall med smukt trappel√∏b til 1. sal, med et stort repos med b√•de skab og mulighed for at s√¶tte fodt√∏j og h√¶nge sit overt√∏j. Lejligheden er indrettet efter den tidsl√∏se og nordiske stil med hvide v√¶gge og smukke egetr√¶sgulve og med kvalitet for √∏je i alle leder og kanter. De store vinduer lader masser af naturligt lys str√∏mme ind gennem hele lejligheden.

¬∑ Stor stue med sydvest vendt tagterrasse: Stuen er rummelig og har direkte adgang til en stor, delvist overd√¶kket tagterrasse p√• 22 m¬≤, hvor man kan nyde udelivet √•ret rundt. Tagterrassen fungerer n√¶rmest som et ekstra v√¶relse, n√•r det er for√•r og sommer. Terrassen er ikke indregnet i boligkvadramteterne.

¬∑ Nyt k√∏kken med spise-plads ved et charmerende rundt vindue: Det √∏stvendte k√∏kken er lyst og indbydende med morgensolen, der str√∏mmer ind gennem vinduerne.

¬∑ Lys og √•ben planl√∏sning: En stor fransk d√∏r mellem k√∏kkenet og stuen s√∏rger for, at lyset flyder frit igennem hele lejligheden.

¬∑ Nyt badev√¶relse: Det moderne badev√¶relse er udstyret med vaskes√∏jle, og en rummelig bruseniche.

¬∑ To gode v√¶relser: Der er to v√¶relser, som begge har en god st√∏rrelse og placering.

Ejendommen:
Hele ejendommen er nyrenoveret b√•de indvendigt og udvendigt. Der er lagt nyt tag, installeret gulvvarme, og vi er i gang med at f√¶rdigg√∏re haven b√•de foran og bagved huset, s√• omgivelserne bliver lige s√• indbydende som lejligheden selv.

Beliggenhed:
Huset er beliggende i R√∏dovre, t√¶t p√• det natursk√∏nne omr√•de ved Damhuss√∏en og de rekreative omr√•der ved Vestvolden. Indk√∏bsmuligheder, som Netto og Rema 1000 er lige ved h√•nden.  Indenfor g√• afstand er R√∏dovre Centrum, er meget hyggeligt med 160 specialbutikker samt det hyggelige Damhustorv med caf√©er, sports-butikker, slagter, isbod og en jordb√¶rbod om sommeren. Offentlig transport er ogs√• let tilg√¶ngelig, med buslinje 7A og R√∏dovre Station i n√¶rheden, samt nem adgang til K√∏benhavn. P√Ö cykel tager det blot 20 min til K√∏benhavns R√•dhus.

title: Totalrenoveret lejlighed
description:
Tilbagetrukket fra Frederikssundsvej m√∏der man denne beundringsv√¶rdige ejendom fra 1908, der f√∏rhen har v√¶ret ''Poul Fechtels Hospital'' som i 2002 gennemgik en forvandling og blev etableret med 16 l√¶kre lejligheder. Denne lejlighed ligger ud mod p-pladsen og dermed trafik fra gaden. I kan helt unikt flytte ind i √©n af mezzanin / stuelejlighederne i ejendommen, hvor elevatoren nemt og bekvemt sikrer jer niveaufri adgang lige til d√∏ren ‚Äì velkommen indenfor:
Gl√¶d jer til en hverdag kendetegnet ved masser af lysindfald mod syg og sydvest og en dejlig rolig atmosf√¶re. Derudover er lejligheden pr√¶get af en fantastisk varm og stemningsfuld indretning med nydelige tr√¶gulve, flotte farvevalg, charmerende sprossede vinduer og moderne materialevalg i alle rum!
De 112 kvadratmeter er udnyttet til perfektion, og alle rum er s√¶rdeles veldisponerede med masser af plads og luft. I oplever det allerede i det kombinerede entr√©- og gangareal, som er indrettet med god skabsplads, s√• I kan opbevare st√∏vsugeren, strygebr√¶ttet og vinterfrakkerne. Videre er der adgang til et dejlig stort flisebadev√¶relse med rigtig god plads, spots i loftet, separat brusemilj√∏, et stort h√•ndvaskm√∏bel samt god plads til vaskemaskinen. L√¶ngere fremme ankommer I til boligens stilfulde k√∏kken opf√∏rt i klassiske sorte elementer ‚Äì naturligvis med opvaskemaskine ‚Äì samt med masser af skabsplads. Herudover adgang til haven via bagtrappen hvor I kan nyde et glas vin o. lign.
Afslutningsvis rummer lejligheden 1 fantastisk sovev√¶relse med masser af kvadratmeter til b√•de dobbeltsengen og kontor. Den stemningsfulde opholdsstue kan I indrette jer med sofam√∏bler, spisebord. En utrolig vellykket og alsidig planl√∏sning til mange m√•lgrupper!
Her bliver I del af en god, nyere lejeforening, der tilbyder elevator, d√∏rtelefon, parkering nedenfor (privatparkering 1000 kr. pr md. / mulighed for ladestander), t√∏rrek√¶lder, cykelparkering og en sk√∏n f√¶lles have; dertil h√∏rer der et privat k√¶lderrum til lejligheden. Hele herligheden kan ‚Äì og skal! ‚Äì opleves p√• ydre N√∏rrebro t√¶t p√• flere gode offentlige transportmuligheder (busser, metro og S-tog), shopping, indk√∏b, specialbutikker og et v√¶ld af sk√∏nne spisesteder.

Do you want to live in Nordhavn, in the new property Sundmolehusene from 2017, along the new canals, old industrial buildings, with the Metro, sea bathing facilities, cafes and shops just around the corner. title: KUN 1 m√•neds depositum - Indretningsvenlig 4-v√¶r lejlighed med altan ud til g√•rden
description:
Om boligen: 

 

 Du bliver m√∏dt af en indbydende og rolig atmosf√¶re, der g√•r igennem hele boligen. Lejligheden er en rummelig 4-v√¶relses optimeret med en god planl√∏sning, store vinduespartier der giver et dejligt lysindfald, materialer i god kvalitet samt gulvvarme. 

 Boligen byder f√∏rst p√• fin entr√© hvor her er plads til at h√¶nge overt√∏jet og stille skoene. 

 Man tr√¶der herefter videre ind i det store √•bne k√∏kken-alrum, hvor det smukke hvide Svane k√∏kken, st√•r i god kontrast til de varme egetr√¶sparketgulve. K√∏kkenet har alt i h√•rde hvidevarer, kogeplade, k√∏le-/fryseskab, indbygningsovn og opvaskemaskine.  K√∏kken-alrummet kan fint indrettes med spiseafdeling i forl√¶ngelse af k√∏kkenet samt et hyggeligt stueomr√•de, hvor man kan slappe af i sofaen. Fra alrummet har man udgang til en dejlig stor altan ud mod g√•rden, hvor udelivet og solen kan nydes med et glas koldt at drikke eller en god kop kaffe. 

 Sovev√¶relset har en god st√∏rrelse, s√• der er fin plads til b√•de seng og opbevaring. I forl√¶ngelse af sovev√¶relset ligger lejlighedens depotrum, med indbyggede skabe og ekstra plads til opbevaring. 

 Desuden byder de 2 ekstra v√¶relser p√• mange anvendelsesmuligheder, alt efter om du har behov for et b√∏rnev√¶relse, kontor eller g√¶stev√¶relse. 

 Badev√¶relset er bekl√¶dt med flotte store gr√• fliser, her er separat bruseniche og der er naturligvis indrettet med vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler. 

 Bem√¶rk venligst, at billederne kan v√¶re fra en anden bolig, hvorfor indretning, beliggenhed og udsigt kan variere. Materialevalg og kvalitet er den samme for alle boliger i ejendommen. 

 Se plantegning for indretning af denne bolig. 

 

  Om ejendommen: 

 

 Flot karr√©ejendom med fantastiske rammer for et st√¶rkt f√¶llesskab, hvor f√¶lleshuset, orangeriet og g√•rdhaven er omdrejningspunktet 

 Ejendommen er tegnet af C.F. M√∏ller Architects og byder p√• 264 lejligheder med 2-5 v√¶relser, s√•ledes er der t√¶nkt p√• b√•de sm√• og store behov. 

 I g√•rdhaven finder du en r√¶kke f√¶llesfaciliteter, heriblandt vores charmerende f√¶lleshus med sit tilh√∏rende og hyggelige orangeri, som er designet til at fremme trivsel og skabe grobund for et spirende f√¶llesskab. 

 H√∏rk√¶r Have st√•r til at blive DGNB guld-certificeret. Det er din garanti for at flytte ind i en ejendom, hvor der er t√¶nkt p√• milj√∏et samt din sundhed og trivsel. Her er blandt andet anvendt milj√∏venlige materialer, s√∏rget for et godt indeklima og skabt gode, v√¶rdiskabende f√¶llesfaciliteter. 

 

 Om omr√•det: 

 

H√∏rk√¶r Have ligger centralt i Herlev, s√• du er aldrig langt fra din n√¶ste destination 

 H√∏rk√¶r Have ligger midt i Herlev, et stenkast fra Herlev bymidte og kun 13km fra K√∏benhavns R√•dhusplads. Med S-togstationen, Motorring 3 og letbanen der √•bner i 2025, er alle muligheder √•bne. Med base i H√∏rk√¶r Have er du aldrig langt fra din n√¶ste destination ‚Äì mens n√¶rmilj√∏et byder p√• alt du beh√∏ver, for at skabe en god og nem hverdag med masser af livskvalitet. 

 I Herlev har du alt, du beh√∏ver. Hvad end du s√∏ger gode shoppemuligheder eller fordybelse i naturens ro, finder du det t√¶t p√• H√∏rk√¶r Have. Her kommer du til at bo 10 minutters gang fra Herlev bymidte, som byder p√• b√•de shopping, gode kulturelle oplevelser og et ugentlig gr√∏nttorv, hvor du kan forsyne dig med l√¶kre, friske r√•varer. 

 I Herlev finder du nemt et velfortjent afbr√¶k fra storbyens larm og kan i stedet nyde roen og den friske, gr√∏nne luft. Tag eksempelvis forbi S√∏mosen eller Naturcenter Kildeg√•rden, hvor b√∏rn og voksne kan nyde naturlige omgivelser og hilse p√• b√•de lam og tyrekalve. Herlev har ogs√• et farverigt idr√¶tsliv, hvor gode sportsfaciliteter prioriteres. Her kan hele familien dyrke deres foretrukne aktivitet ‚Äì alt fra bold- og holdsport til kampsport, ridning eller sv√∏mning.

title: Penthouse med udsigt over f√¶lled & 80 kvm. privat tagterrasse
description:
KOM MED INDENFOR I DENNE USAMMENLIGNELIGE PENTHOUSE I F√òRSTE R√ÜKKE TIL F√ÜLLED!Gl√¶d dig til at flytte ind i en dr√∏m af en lejebolig, hvor alle materialer er n√∏je udvalgt og i et h√∏jt kvalitetsniveau. Det er liebhaveri inden for lejeboliger, hvor kun det bedste er godt nok. Her kan du f√• opfyldt dr√∏mmen om k√∏kken-alrum, stort badev√¶relse, rummelige v√¶relser og et fantastisk uderum med medf√∏lgende havem√∏bler, men du f√•r samtidig en unik placering mellem Islands Brygges mange vandaktiviteter og byliv, og F√¶lledens vilde naturomr√•der.
Lejligheden er en del projektet "Terrasserne", som stod klar til indflytning i december 2022.
K√∏kken-alrummet er boligens hjerte, placeret ud til de h√∏je vinduespartier og skyded√∏re, som kan √•bnes helt op ud til en stor terrasse p√• hele 80 kvm. Det betyder, at man i hele sommerhalv√•ret kan lade d√∏rene st√• √•bne ud til sin gr√∏nne oase, og nyde hvordan k√∏kken-alrummet bliver dobbelt s√• stort.
Fra n√¶sten alle lejlighedens rum har du direkte udgang til lejlighedens tagterrasse eller altan. Tagterrassen vender mod √∏st og syd og er hele 96 kvm. Dybden p√• tagterrassen g√∏r, at du nemt kan invitere st√∏rre selskaber til grill-aften og afslapning p√• altanen. Du har den smukkeste og mest eksklusive udsigt over F√¶lled direkte fra din tagterrasse og n√•r vejret ikke tillader ophold udenfor, ja s√• nyder du blot udsigten indenfor.K√∏kkenet indeholder:‚Ä¢ Eksklusiv k√∏kkenl√∏sning fra Designa‚Ä¢ Quooker‚Ä¢ Sort Blanco vask‚Ä¢ Granit bordplader ¬†‚Ä¢ Fingertappede egetr√¶sskuffer‚Ä¢ Miele h√•rde hvidevarer‚Ä¢ Brede egetr√¶sgulve med gulvvarme overalt‚Ä¢ Vink√∏leskab‚Ä¢ Gulv-til-loft vinduer og skyded√∏re med masser af lysindfald
Det eksklusive materialevalg og iscenes√¶ttelsen af boligens livsnyder-tema forts√¶tter p√• de store badev√¶relser. Der er rig mulighed for selvfork√¶lelse, lange bade og spanydelse i lejlighedens badev√¶relse, og lejligheden har desuden ogs√• et ekstra g√¶stetoilet.
Badev√¶relset indeholder:‚Ä¢ Klassisk design med Vola HV1 armatur (mat sort)‚Ä¢ Vola Rainshower bruser (mat sort)‚Ä¢ Miele vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler‚Ä¢ Duravit badm√∏bel i middelhavs-eg med store skuffer inkl. indretningssystem‚Ä¢ Stort spejl med lys fra Duravit‚Ä¢ Sorte spots i loftet, som matcher de mange andre sorte detaljer‚Ä¢ V√¶gh√¶ngt Starck III toilet fra Duravit‚Ä¢ Gulvafl√∏b fra UnidrainSom lejer i denne ejendom f√•r du desuden adgang til det f√¶lles Orangeri, h√¶vet terrasse mod F√¶lled med cykelparkering under, petanque-bane, legeplads og udend√∏rs fitnessomr√•de.¬†Derudover er der privat parkeringsk√¶lder under ejendommen, hvor du kan leje din egen p-plads - naturligvis med ladestander til hver plads. I ejendommen er der ligeledes BWT bl√∏dvandsanl√¶g, s√• du har det reneste vand i alle dine haner. Det kan m√¶rkes p√• b√•de hud, h√•r, vasket√∏j og ikke mindst; mindre reng√∏ring!Der er mulighed for at ans√∏ge om tilladelse til √©t husdyr.Lejligheden kan overtages fra d. 1. oktober 2024.

title: Room in Valby
description:
Hello everyone!!

I am renting out my beautiful bedroom in a 3 bedroom apartment. I am going away for studies and don't really want to give up on my apartment that easy, I really love living here!

You will be sharing with the two others, on the age between 40 -50yo. They are absolutely very chill people and one of them is family member. They are not party animal but definitely some beers every other weekend. 

The moving in date is from 5th of October and the contract is 3 years. ‚ò∫Ô∏è

I might be coming on the weekends and would be a nice fit to have someone from Monday to Friday...we can always get in a better agreement ü§ù 

We have washing machine, dryer, dish washer, balcony, parking lot and a common area downstairs where we can have some BBQ on summer time. 
 
It's close to absolutely everything. Gym, shopping malls, buses, S-train, Metro, supermarkets, even a old Cinema! We got parks everywhere by water, beautiful nature and so on

Write to me for more information  ‚òÄÔ∏è

title: Nymoderniseret 3V med 2 altaner
description:
Lejligheden er netop moderniseret med fokus p√• h√∏j kvalitet og funktionel indretning - Perfekt til parret eller singlefor√¶ldre med b√∏rn.  
Lejligheden er indrettet med entr√© som √•bner op til stor stue med stort vinduesparti i rummets fulde bredde. Herfra udgang til lejlighedens ene altan. Fra stuen er ligeledes adgang til Invita k√∏kken med egetr√¶sbordplade og alt i kvalitets h√•rde hvidevarer; K√∏le/fryseskab, induktionskogeplade, ovn, emh√¶tte, opvaskemaskine og kombineret vaske-/t√∏rremaskine.
L√¶kkert nyrenoveret badev√¶relse med separat bruseniche, skabsplads og gulvvarme. To v√¶relser med sk√∏nt lysindfald fra de store vinduespartier, hvoraf det ene v√¶relse har udgang til altan. I gangen mellem de to v√¶relser er indbygget skabsv√¶g.
Lejligheden er beliggende p√• en stille sidegade i det hyggelig Holl√¶nderdybet, t√¶t til Amagerbrogade med et hyggeligt lokalmilj√∏ hvor alt hvad du skal bruge i hverdagen findes i n√¶rheden: Gode indk√∏bsmuligheder, diverse forretninger i Amagercenteret, restauranter, caf√©er og take-away muligheder.
I l√∏bet af efter√•ret f√•r ejendommen nye altaner. Da prisen for dette arbejde er inkluderet i den annoncerede pris, gives en m√•nedlig refusion p√• kr. 1900,- frem til arbejdet er udf√∏rt.
Der er der gode mulighed for offentlig transport i omr√•det med Metro, busser og dermed kun f√• minutter til centrum. 

Lejevilk√•r: 
Husleje pr. m√•ned: 15.750,- 
Aconto varme: 1000,-		
Aconto vand: 300,- 
Beboerrepr√¶sentation: 46,- 

Engangsbetaling ved lejekontraktens indg√•else:
F√∏rste m√•neds leje + aconto: 
Depositum svarende til 3 mdr. leje
Forudbetalt leje: 1 mdr. leje der d√¶kker opsigelsesperioden

‚ÄÉ
√òvrige lejevilk√•r:
- Lejligheden er et ikke-ryger lejem√•l og det er ikke tilladt at holde dyr.  
- Lejem√•let er tidsubegr√¶nset og lejer har 3 m√•neders opsigelse. 
- Lejem√•let skal afleveres i samme malerm√¶ssige stand som det blev overtaget, hvilket sker ved udlejers professionelle h√•ndv√¶rkere og for lejers regning. Af denne grund skal lejem√•let fraflyttes 10 hverdage f√∏r lejem√•lets udl√∏b. 

Venligst skriv om dig/jer selv, dine/jeres lejepr√¶ferencer samt tidshorisont, s√• vi har alle muligheder for at matche den rette lejer med det rette lejem√•l.

OBS! Fotos er fra et tilsvarende istandsat lejem√•l, men f√∏r nye facadevinduer var isat. Der er derfor nu endnu mere lys i stue og v√¶relser.

title: Climate friendly appartment on N√∏rrebro - 3 min walk from Metro
description:
Perfect for the young couple! 
Unfurnished apartment.

Unique opportunity to live in newly constructed bright youth housing on the roof of former industrial building.
The modern accommodation consists of an open kitchen / living room with a fantastic light and a spacious bathroom. The appartment contain a loft with the option of either sleeping space or office, as well as a storage room. Also there is a storage room as seen in the pictures. 

The appartments are particularly suitable for a couple or alone. 

Climate-friendly housing

The homes are built within our climate-friendly strategy.
They are insulated to modern standards and are equipped with a green sedum roof, where solar cells are installed, making the building self-sufficient with electricity.
In addition, there have been investments in intelligent meter solutions from NorthQ, which through data should help tenants to reduce consumption.

Unique community on the roof

The homes contain various common facilities, which are the foundation of a unique community. There is a communal laundry, a large roof terrace and a common living room with shared kitchen, where there is great opportunity to meet and talk with the other young people.

Multicultural area in development

Heimdalsgade is located on outer N√∏rrebro. The area is rapidly developing, among other things. Due to the opening of Cityringen, where both N√∏rrebro Station and Skjolds Plads Station are within a few minutes walk.
The property is close to shopping and fitness, as is a great cafe life in the area. You get the open green area Superkilen and the Black Square in the backyard.
Large educational places such as KU, CBS and Metropol are within cycling distance.

description:

Become part of a vibrant community of young professionals and live stress-free in a spacious shared apartment! üíÜ

G√•rdrummet beplantes med tr√¶er og stauder i forskellige farver og h√∏jder. Altaner og terrasser skaber privathed, men ogs√• mulighed for social kon¬≠takt p√• langs og tv√¶rs mellem boligerne.

title: Sea views, sunny balcony (Islands Brygge)
description:
INTERNATIONAL EXPATS ONLY: Sea views, sunny south-facing balcony, designer furniture, two spacious rooms, bright modern kitchen, and beautiful views of the Copenhagen's harbour-front. 

Fully furnished with Scandinavian designer furniture from HAY. A bright classic Copenhagen apartment with lots of light and sunshine.¬†It commands a large balcony with great views of the sea and the sunset behind the city skyline.¬†

You will have total privacy as there are no houses directly opposite - no one can look into your space.

The city's vibrant waterfront park is nearby and the city centre is just across the nearby "Langebro" bridge within walking distance.¬†

The flat has recently been renovated with a designer kitchen and a Siemens quality stove, fridge and a dish washer.¬†

All rooms (except the bathroom) feature solid wooden floor boards.¬†

The bathroom is small and it features a toilet, a sink and a shower.¬† 
Please note, there are no elevators as this is a historic building.

An iron, iron board and a hair dryer us present in the flat.

There's a professional laundromat and dryer facility in the basement (pay per use, with an online booking feature). 

The flat is located on the fourth floor giving you magnificent views.

The district of "Islands Brygge" is one of the most popular places to live and work in Copenhagen: Lots of cafes, galleries and small independent shops. 

The neighbourhood features one of Europe's most modern open-air harbour pools (with a communal sauna facility in the winter). 

The Islands Brygge metro stop is only 6-7 minutes walk from the flat. The total travel time between the airport and the Islands Brygge station is around 18-20 minutes.

description:
P√• vegne af vores klient udlejes denne l√¶kre 2v lejlighed p√• ubestemt tid. 

Vores kommende lejer f√•r 66 velindrettede kvadratmeter med tilh√∏rende altan. Lejligheden fremst√•r ny og indflytningsklar. 

K√∏kkenet fremst√•r i tidl√∏st design med grebsfrie fronter, samt opvaskemaskine. I forl√¶ngelse med k√∏kkenet finder man opholdsstuen, som rummer god plads til sofa og tv-arrangement.

Lejligheden er en del af Trikotageparken som er opf√∏rt i 2020 og som er Svanem√¶rket byggeri. Arkitekterne bag Trikotageparken har haft stor fokus p√• at skabe hjem, hvor sol og udsigtsforhold er prioriteret h√∏jt. Derfor er lejlighederne i Trikotageparken placeret, s√• der er skabt det mest optimale lys i alle boligerne. Der er desuden en hyggelig f√¶lles g√•rdrum, med aktiv natur legeplads.  

Denne lejlighed er beliggende blot fem minutters g√• gang til det n√¶rmeste supermarked, og inden for 700 meter n√•r man Ryparken st., hvorfra du let kan n√• K√∏benhavns centrum p√• kort tid. Lejligheden ligger desuden i n√¶rheden af sk√∏n natur, som Emdrup S√∏
Kun 10 min. p√• cykel fra Indre √òsterbro, 9 min. til Svannem√∏llestranden, mens Strandvejen, Hellerup og Tuborg havns handelsliv og restauranter blot er 8 min. v√¶k. Derudover finder i Ryvangs naturpark kun 400 m. fra lejligheden og den velbes√∏gte legeplads og park ved S√∏holmslund lige udenfor hovedd√∏ren.

Kontakt os for aftale om fremvisning. 

ENGLISH 
On behalf of our client, this exquisite 2-room apartment is available for rent for an indefinite period.

Our future tenant will enjoy 66 well-appointed square meters complete with a balcony. The apartment is new and ready for move-in.

The kitchen features a timeless design with handle-free fronts and a dishwasher. Adjacent to the kitchen is the living room, offering ample space for a sofa and TV setup.

Additionally, there's a large and stylish bathroom equipped with both a washing machine and dryer.

The apartment is part of Trikotageparken, constructed in 2020 and is a Swan eco-labelled building. The architects behind Trikotageparken have focused heavily on creating homes where sunlight and view conditions are a high priority. Hence, the apartments in Trikotageparken are positioned to optimize light in all dwellings. There's also a cozy communal courtyard with a natural playground.

This apartment is located just a five-minute walk from the nearest supermarket, and within 700 meters you reach Ryparken station, from where you can easily get to the center of Copenhagen in a short time. The apartment is also close to beautiful natural areas, such as Emdrup Lake. Only 10 min. by bike from Inner √òsterbro, 9 min. to Svannem√∏lle Beach, while Strandvejen, Hellerup, and the commercial and restaurant area of Tuborg Harbor are just 8 min. away. Additionally, Ryvang Nature Park is only 400 m. from the apartment, and the popular playground and park at S√∏holmslund are right outside the front door.

Contact us to schedule a viewing

title: Kom og oplev Bakkek√¶ret
description:
Velkommen til Bakkek√¶ret!
√ÖBENT HUS:
Bakkek√¶ret:

Boligerne bliver f√¶rdige i 6 etaper og denne bolig ligger i ejendommens anden etape med indflytning til efter√•ret.
G√•rdrum og f√¶llesskab:
Bakkek√¶rets hjerte er det gr√∏nne bakkedrag i g√•rdrummet, hvor gr√¶sset vokser til, tr√¶erne b√¶rer frugt og urtehaverne kan dyrkes. Her kan b√∏rnene udforske naturen og tumle p√• legepladsen eller du kan nyde en fredelig kop kaffe i en varm solplet.

Du kan g√• en tur p√• det lille str√∏g ved Herlev Torv eller bes√∏ge butikkerne i Herlev Bymidte Center. Kun et par minutter fra bymidten ligger ogs√• BIG Shopping, hvor du kan finde bl.a. byggemarked, en biograf og et legeland for de mindste.
Forestil dig at bo et sted, hvor du kan have naturen og alt hvad du skal bruge i hverdagslivet t√¶t p√• ‚Äì og samtidig have K√∏benhavn inden for r√¶kkevidde. Hop p√• cyklen, ind i bilen eller S-toget p√• Herlev Station, og kom let p√• arbejde. G√• en tur i en af byens mange parker eller dyrk outdoor-livet i et af de gr√∏nne naturomr√•der.
Praktisk:
Derudover f√•r du:
- Elevator i bygningen
- Depotrum i k√¶lder eller plint
- Det er muligt at leje en p-plads i k√¶lderen (der er ogs√• el ladepladser)
Det med sm√•t:
- Det er ikke tilladt at st√• i RKI
- K√¶ledyr skal godkendes af udlejer
- Bem√¶rk, at billedmaterialet ikke n√∏dvendigvis stammer fra den p√•g√¶ldende bolig

Roomie wanted for room.
Hello everyone!
As our roomie is moving in with her boyfriend, we are looking for a roomie to take over a room from 16. September 2024 (flexible move-in date) for unlimited rent!
The room is approx. 9.5m2 in size (and unfurnished) and the apartment is a large and bright apartment of 100m2. Our lovely apartment is located in Valby by the machine factory (only 5 minutes walk from Valby st). As well as Rema and Netto at your fingertips.

* Gender is secondary
* We both speak English

Sebastian:
I am 22 years old and work in a bank. In my free time I play soccer, hang out with friends and also really enjoy being social.
Sabine:
I am 23 years old and come from Germany. I study at the University of Applied Sciences and work part-time. Besides work, I love to socialize with friends, go to the gym or travel.

title: Fuldt m√∏bleret popul√¶rt kanalhus med direkte adgang til vandet og egen b√•dplads!
description:
Furnished Townhouse apartment with direct access to the canal.

The apartment offers two levels, of which the ground floor has access to your own platform with boat space and direct access to the water. In addition, the apartment has its own terrace which is located next to the common yard with evening sun and gives the feeling of living in a townhouse. Large spacious kitchen with dining area, bathroom and depot for ex. walk-in or small office space. The upper floor offers 2 good and spacious rooms, as well as a large bathroom. There is floor heating in the apartment.

The area:

The apartment is located on the island of Egholm on Sluseholmen. The island is a "corner island" and is one of the most attractive with modern properties, as it is located just up the "vesttrappen" and by the Dutch-inspired channel. Sluseholmen has a good combination of both being new and already established. The area offers good shopping, cafes and plenty of environment. Close to Copenhagen city, Copenhagen airport etc. Also the cozy harbor bus sails from Sluseholmen to inner city in just over 20 minutes. The area has its own school and several day care institutions. There is an established harbor bath platforms in the neighborhood, where there is also the possibility of winter bathing.

Lejligheden byder p√• 2 plan, hvoraf stueplan ligger forskudt med egen b√•dplads og direkte adgang til vandet, derudover har lejligheden egen terrasse som ligger ud til f√¶llesg√•rden med aftensol og f√•r lejligheden til at fungere lidt som et r√¶kkehus. Der er gulvvarme i hele boligen. 
Parking licens available for 220/month and membership kayak 500 a year.
Omr√•det:

Sluseholmen har en god kombination af b√•de at v√¶re nyt og allerede etableret. Omr√•det byder p√• gode indk√∏bsmuligheder, cafeer og masser af milj√∏, samtidig med at der kun er f√• minutters k√∏rsel til motorvej, lufthavn samt K√∏benhavn Centrum. Ogs√• den hyggelige havnebus sejler fra Sluseholmen til indre by p√• lidt over 20 minutter. Omr√•det har egen skole og flere daginstitutioner. Der er etableret havnebad i kvarteret, hvor der ogs√• er mulighed for vinterbadning.

My wife and I are renting out our lovely, great view, apartment on Amager Strand. Available from 1 Sep.
It is currently a three-bedroom apartment (total 106 sqm) but it is possible to make an extra room so that it becomes a regular 4-bedroom. (See alternative floor plan).

Here there is plenty of space for a dining room and living room. The property is from 2014 and the apartments is on the 10th floor, of course with a lift.
The address is Amager Strandvej but it is on a small branch away from the road but close to the Metro line. 
A lovely place, close to the beach, approx. 200 m to the metro, specialty shops, cafes and shopping - everything in walking distance.
It is possible to use the apartment as a shared apartment or as a 2-year full rent, which potentially could be extended.
The price depends on whether there is a need for an extra room and whether it is to be rented out in parts or in full. Rented as is 19.900 and 1.600 in consumption per month.

Furnished 1-bedroom apartment in Nicolineparken at Islands Brygge

Welcome to this large good 1-bedroom apartment of 90 sqm with a large terrace facing the courtyard and the evening sun. The property was built in 2006 by the architectural firm Smith Hammer Lassen and they have in this building choose the best materials available.
The apartment contains: Entrance hall with built-in closet space, large open kitchen with dining area and open living room with direct access to the west-facing terrace. Spacious bedroom with closet wall and nice bathroom with shower and laundry facilities.
In the property there are several good facilities. You can enjoy the green courtyard environment containing lawn, playground, football pitch and table/bench set. For the apartment you can rent a parking space in the underground car park - price 350 per month.
You are located in the attractive Nicolineparken close to both water and city. The harbour bath's fresh water and green area is a three-minute walk from the address, and on the way you can enhance the experience by swinging by some of the many good caf√©s and coffee shops.

title: Well lay-out with big bathroom
description:
The flat is located at √òresundsvej , it is located 7 mins walk to both metro stations ( Lergravsparken & √òresund) ‚Äì M2 line

It is a 1932 built high entrance flat ( almost like the 1st floor), 66 sqm, with a great lay-out, 1 south facing bedroom , 1 living room, south facing separate kitchen and big bathroom with washing machine
Strictly Non-smoking
The flat will be rented unfurnished.
The windows are quite newly-installed , so has a very good sound & heat isolation
The flat is in a very nicely organized community, no loud neighbours , my flat has easy access from the kitchen door to a very nice backyard with sun most of the day and there is also a laundry room in the backyard if needed.

Rental period is 1 year, which has the possibility of extension
Heating is 700 dkk/month on top of the rent, to be settled accordingly as per own use
Electricty is at your own registration
I do not expect the walls to be freshly painted at the end of the lease , since they are also not freshly painted now, provided that there are no obvious damages to the walls ( like removing the wall paper , creating big holes , visible dirt etc)
The floors were newly sanded & polished , however again I don‚Äôt expect to ask for new sanding at the end of the lease , provided that there are no obvious damages to the floor (like big scratches, water damage etc)

description:

Til lejligheden h√∏rer 2 private g√•rdhaver og 2 parkeringspladser. Omr√•det er omkranset af en smuk smedejernsport, der sikrer privatlivets fred og tryghed. Dette lejem√•l er et sj√¶ldent fund, hvor du har muligheden for at leje noget helt unikt og i en smuk historisk bygning, der tidligere har tilh√∏rt den katolske kirke. I 1800-tallet var Polly Berling, tidligere ejer af Berlingske Tidende, en markant skikkelse. title: Udlejning af v√¶relse til stille og rolig person
description:
Hyggeligt v√¶relse p√• Amager
Jeg lejer et v√¶relse ud p√• Amager, det er ca. 14 kvm og med udgang til en st√∏rre altan. Udover altanen deles vi om k√∏kken, gang og et mindre bad/toilet. Lejligheden ligger ikke langt fra hverken metro eller strand. Der st√•r et skab i v√¶relse, derudover er det um√∏bleret. Der en vaskek√¶lder i andelsforeningen, som du gerne m√• bruge. Det er vigtigt for mig at finde en person til at leje v√¶relset, som det vil fungere godt med i hverdagen, s√• lejligheden kan blive et rart hjem for os begge. 

Min erfaring med at leje v√¶relset ud er, at det er godt at vi deler lidt om vores interessere og hvordan vi kan lide at have det i vores hjem. Vi beh√∏ver ikke at v√¶re ens, men det er godt at vide om vi har noget til f√¶lles og t√¶nker lidt p√• samme m√•de, samt at f√• en fornemmelse af om vi vil kunne kommunikere godt.
Jeg er en person, der godt kan lide, at det er stille og roligt, s√¶rligt om aftenen fra ved 22:00-tiden. Det er vigtigt for mig, at det er rent i lejligheden, derfor vil jeg gerne have at opvasken bliver taget/stillet i opvaskemaskinen, n√•r man er f√¶rdig med at spise. Jeg t√¶nker, at vi kan skiftes til at tage reng√∏ring i f√¶llesarealet hver anden uge. 

Lidt om mig, jeg er 35 √•r, jeg er uddannet p√¶dagog og jeg er i gang med at l√¶se en overbygning i P√¶dagogisk Antropologi p√• DPU. Jeg arbejder som vikar p√• et hjeml√∏se herberg og et psykiatrisk botilbud. Jeg er glad for meditation og yoga, jeg l√∏ber ogs√• en del, og jeg kan lide at sv√∏mme turer p√• stranden, samt vandreruter. At male og tegne er ogs√• vigtigt for mig i perioder. Jeg er blevet inspireret af det buddhistiske livssyn igennem meditation, jeg er selv vegetar (jeg spiser fisk), jeg har ikke noget imod, at der bliver tilberedt k√∏d i mit k√∏kken, men jeg kan godt lide, at de animalske produkter er enten √∏kologiske eller frilands. Jeg h√•ber, at vi vil kunne f√• det hyggeligt sammen, samtidig vil jeg f√• travlt bl.a. med mit studie, og jeg har ogs√• brug for tid alene. 
Hvis du er interesseret i at se v√¶relset, m√• du meget gerne skrive lidt om dig selvüòä 

Bedste hilsner
Estrid.

title: 4 v√¶relses lejlighed med sydvendt altan
description:
Lejligheden
                            Lejligheden fremst√•r lys, moderne og stilren med matlakeret gulv i eg og et stort og √•bent k√∏kken-alrum. K√∏kkenet er hvidt JKE Design med gr√• bordplade og sokkel samt Energi A++ Bosch opvaskemaskine og integreret k√∏leskab og fryser. Lejligheden er nem at indrette, s√• du har rig mulighed for at s√¶tte dit eget personlige pr√¶g p√• dit spritnye hjem. Dertil har lejligheden en funktionel ruminddeling, hvor hver en kvadratmeter er udnyttet optimalt og tilpasset en moderne livsstil. Badev√¶relset er stort med plads til armbev√¶gelser og kan rumme en hel familie p√• en travl hverdagsmorgen. P√• badev√¶relset er der desuden installeret gulvvarme, og her finder du b√•de energieffektiv A+++ vaskemaskine og B t√∏rretumbler fra Bosch. Det er muligt at ans√∏ge om husdyrtilladelse i alle vores lejem√•l. OBS: √∏nskes der m√•l af lejligheden skal du selv huske opm√•lings udstyr til fremvisning, da der ikke er m√•l p√• plantegningen.

                                      NB: Billederne viser derfor ikke den p√•g√¶ldende lejlighed, men i stedet billeder fra pr√∏veboligen. Billedernes form√•l er at give en fornemmelse af stil og materialevalg. Ift. planl√∏sning henviser vi til plantegningen. Kontakt vores udlejningsteam, hvis boligen har interesse, eller book en fremvisning direkte her p√• lejem√•let.

                                                      Ejendommen
                            Agerhusene er tegnet af den prisvindende tegnestue Danielsen Architecture, der altid tager udgangspunkt i beboernes behov. Samlet best√•r ejendommen af otte klyngehuse med to gr√∏nne g√•rdrum, samt passager og byrum. Dette skaber hyggelige f√¶llesomr√•der, hvor beboere kan m√∏des til grillhygge og legeaftaler i trygge omgivelser. Der er anlagt legeomr√•der til b√∏rnene, og som en del af bydelsparken anl√¶gges en f√¶lles boldbane. Dertil skabes der opholdsrum, der g√∏r det muligt altid at finde en hyggelig plet, man kan sl√• sig ned p√•. Alle Agerhusenes otte klyngehuse fremst√•r indbydende med flotte, lyse opgange, der alle byder p√• elevatorer, der g√∏r det nemt at komme op og ned med f.eks. barnevogne eller indk√∏bsposer. Dertil er udvalgte flader i hvert hus malet hver sin unikke farve, der giver et s√¶rligt pr√¶g til hver enkelt bygning. Alle lejligheder har tilknyttet et privat depotrum til opbevaring, som findes enten i k√¶lderen, i selve boligen eller i et udend√∏rs skur. Du finder b√•de bilparkering og overd√¶kket cykelparkering t√¶t p√• bygningerne.

                                      Lokalomr√•det
              Agerhusene har en optimal placering - t√¶t p√• H√∏je Taastrup Station og midt i en aktiv og pulserende by, hvor du har mulighed for at engagere dig i et v√¶ld af aktiviteter. Med S-toget kan du v√¶re p√• K√∏benhavns Hovedbaneg√•rd p√• bare 12 minutter. Derudover er der kort k√∏reafstand til b√•de Ring 5 og Holb√¶kmotorvejen. H√∏je Taastrup er ogs√• ideel for dig, der √∏nsker at v√¶re t√¶t p√• natur og gr√∏nne omgivelser. I kommunen kan du finde op til tre forskellige skove, hvor du kan tage p√• cykeltur, l√∏betr√¶ne, fiske eller nyde en picnic i det fri. Agerhusene ligger kun 600 meter fra City2, hvor du kan shoppe i over 90 forskellige butikker. Spacious unfurnished room (marked in blue on the floor plan) with a large east-facing balcony.
Shared kitchen and bath shared with one other person. Relatively newly renovated kitchen with dishwasher and induction hob. The kitchen also serves as a common living space and is partially furnished with a dining table, folding chairs, and a sofa. The bathroom has a bathtub and completely new sink and new toilet. Shared laundry room in the basement with several washing machines and there is access to shared locked indoor bicycle parking in the basement. Access to parking.

The apartment itself has a great location in the hip Copenhagen northwest area, where everything you need is within walking distance. You are right next to the bus stop Banebrinken (bus 18) and Emdrup St. (S train B line). 5 minutes to several restaurants (sushi, pizza, Indian), a grocery store and gym, as well as parks/walking areas (Bispebjerg parkalle).
Less than 1km from Utterslevs mose(very nice natural area, great for walks), Bispebjerg hospital, Emdrup lake, and much more.

The room will be rented for one year with the possibility of an extension. The resignation period is 3 months from both sides.

I stueetagen opf√∏res tre erhvervslejem√•l, som kan v√¶re med til at skabe liv i ejendommen. Det prim√¶re erhvervslokale p√• hj√∏rnet er forberedt til en hyggelig caf√©.

Indenfor kort afstand finder du gode skoler, institutioner og arbejdspladser. title: Beautiful and big room in a shared apartment in the city centre
description:
Join our beautiful and spacious shared apartment for young professionals!

We have a beautiful brightly-lid private room available in our fully furnished apartment.

üè∞The apartment:

This wonderful apartment is two stories and is on the top floor of the building. The apartment also has a great rooftop terrace. There is a cozy living room on the first floor as well as a tv room on the second floor. The dining room is combined with the living room, with a French balcony the lightens up the space. There are two bathrooms with showers on the first floor. The kitchen is big and spacious with lots of natural light coming in.The uniqueness of this apartment is definitely the terrace on the second floor, which is big enough for having dinners and brunches for all the housemates, while admiring a beautiful view of Copenhagen. There are a total of five rooms: one couples room and four single rooms. 

üõåThe room:

The room is fully furnished with beautiful Nordic design. It includes everything you need: a big bed of 140X200 (including duvets, pillows and bed linen), a desk with a chair, a big closet (with hangers and shelves), storage units under the bed, laundry basket, lamps, plants and other decorations. 

üó∫Ô∏èThe location:

The apartment is located in the city centre, close to the famous Islands Brygge harbour bath where you can swim in summer. Central station is a 5 min walk away and the Copenhagen shopping streets start around the corner. 

üíÉThe housemates:
You will be living with other young professionals from different backgrounds and nationalities, all working in the city. The average age is around 30 and we share the idea that living together means to respect each others schedule and keeping the shared space tidy and treating the apartment as our shared home. 

üìú The price is all inclusive and gives you: 

- rent, water, electricity
- high speed internet
- beautiful design furniture 
- weekly cleaning
- biweekly linen change 
- shared common supplies (toilet paper, soap, cooking oil etc.) 

Everything is ready for you to just move in with your suitcase and stay as long as you wish.

The room is perfect for an individual that wants to live stress-free in a nice and clean furnished home with like minded people and have flexible rental terms. The contract renews automatically every month and you can stay as long as you want. 

We hold an interview by phone or video call with each applicant, ensuring compatibility and mutual respect for each other.

We look forward to meeting you!

title: Amazing room in shared apartment overlooking the lakes
description:
This is a beautiful, stylish fully furnished co-living home in the centre of Copenhagen, with Nordic design interior and quality appliances. 

You get a private room and space in a big fancy apartment in an awesome location. This particular room is available for one person.

The apartment is located in the hippest area of Copenhagen, Vesterbro. Furthermore, the location is directly facing the famous Copenhagen lakes making it an amazing spot to live with lots of options for hangouts.

Everything is included in one simple price so you can enjoy your life stress-free:
- weekly cleaning, 
- basic supplies, 
- and quality linen and towels supplied and changed for you every 2 weeks
- internet
- all other utility bills

But the best part is definitely the great community of professionals from more than 50 countries you become part of with tons of events and dinners to join - and even the possibility to do weekend swaps in our locations in other cool cities in Europe.

title: Super central private room in shared apartment with CPR (all incl., flexible contracts, also for couples)
description:
Become part of a vibrant community of young professionals and live stress-free in a spacious shared apartment! üíÜ

We have a beautiful and brightly-lid private room available in our fully furnished and serviced co-living apartment in the middle of the city centre called Vestervold.

üè∞The apartment:

This lovely home is located on the 1st floor. There are in total 4 bedrooms, a shared open kitchen space with big dining table and a cozy living room. There are two shared bathrooms.

üõåThe room:

The room (room 1 on the floor plan) is fully furnished with beautiful Nordic design. It includes everything you need for comfortable living: a big bed of 180X200 (including duvets, pillows and bed linen), a desk with a chair, a big closet (with hangers and shelves), storage units under the bed, laundry basket, lamps, plants and other decorations. The room is suitable for both singles and couples. 

üó∫Ô∏èThe location:

Located a drop away from the water, in this newly renovated apartment you are sure to be at peace and quiet. Nearby you can also explore the Royal library. A 2 min walk from the apartment you have the harbour and the newly constructed pedestrian and bike bridge that takes you over to the old and charming neighborhood of Christianshavn. In the other direction, the apartment is a 5 min walk to the City Hall and Gammel Strand (where the metro line runs) and the shopping centre of the city. On the streets Str√¶det or Gammel Strand, there are a wide number of restaurants, cafes and cocktail bars. Perfect streets to explore both traditional Danish food, innovative cocktails and look out at the beautiful canal and the old cobblestone streets. 

üìúOur prices are all inclusive and give you:

- rent, water, electricity
- high speed internet
- beautiful design furniture 
- weekly cleaning
- biweekly linen change 
- shared common supplies (toiletpaper, soap, cooking oil etc.) 

So everything is ready for you to just move in with your suitcase and stay as long as you wish.

The room is perfect for an individual who wants to live stress-free in a nice and clean furnished home with like minded people and have flexible rental terms. The contract renews automatically every month and you can stay as long as you want. 

We hold an interview by phone or video call with each applicant, ensuring compatibility with our concept and mutual respect for each other.

üåç As a member you get access to a wider community of young professionals that live in our apartments in Copenhagen and in other cities (Berlin, Munich, Vienna, Paris, London etc.). Community members enjoy shared events and even the possibility of a temporary room swap with members in other cities.

We look forward to meeting you!

PS: Don‚Äôt hesitate to book a call if you‚Äôre uncertain about your moving plans due COVID-19. We‚Äôre happy to move through the application process now so things are all set for the future, when the time is right for you to arrange your moving plans üëç
