description:
Dejlig og velbeliggende lejlighed p√• Havneholmen p√• Vesterbro i K√∏benhavn. Her f√•r du den perfekte kombination af byliv, natur og vand. Lejligheden er moderne og lys, og med hele to altaner mod henholdsvis √∏st og sydvest, kan du nyde b√•de morgen-, dag- og aftensol. Lejligheden er smagfuldt m√∏bleret og er indrettet med gennemg√•ende k√∏kken-alrum og stue med store vinduespartier, to sovev√¶relser, entr√© og rummeligt badev√¶relse med vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler. Med den nye Havneholmen St. Metro lige om hj√∏rnet har du nem adgang til hele byen. Bag ejendommen ligger Fisketorvet med sit v√¶ld af indk√∏bs- og spisemuligheder, og via Bryggebroen kan du nemt bes√∏ge Islands Brygge. ---- 

Tastefully furnished waterfront apartment 

Nice apartment with great location on Havneholmen on Vesterbro in Copenhagen. Here you get the perfect combination of city life, nature and water. The apartment is modern and bright, and with two balconies to the east and south-west respectively, you can enjoy both morning, daytime and evening sun. The apartment is tastefully furnished and has an open kitchen-dining room and living room area with large windows, two bedrooms, an entrance hall and a spacious bathroom with laundry machine and dryer. With the new Havneholmen St. Metro just around the corner you have easy access to the entire city. Behind the property is also the shopping center Fisketorvet with its wide range of shopping and dining opportunities, and you can easily visit Islands Brygge by crossing the canal on the pedestrian/bike bridge Bryggebroen. When you live in this apartment, you have access to a beautifully landscaped courtyard as well as facilities for sports and entertainment. You also have the option of storing a kayak and there are available spots for boats in the local boat club.

title: Room in furnished and serviced shared apartment for professionals (incl. utilities, internet, cleaning and CPR registration)
description:
Hey hey!

The room in this apartment is part of us. We are a coliving operator that focuses on providing flexible housing for young professionals. We have over 80 beautiful apartments to choose from. All apartments are fully furnished and equipped, so you can literally move in with your suitcase. 

Please be aware that the photos are an example of one of our rooms. 

Our room prices include the following:

- Rent
- Utilities (gas, water, electricity)
- Furniture
- Wireless internet
- Cleaning service
- CPR registration
- Access to the community

The minimum contract duration is 3 months and you can stay as long as you want with only a 1-month termination notice.

People that live with are generally between 25 and 35 and all working professionals. We have an active community and host regular events where you get to expand your network in the city. 

We would be happy to get in touch and help you find your perfect home in Copenhagen.

If you have questions then feel free to reach out via Boligportal. 

Warm regards,

Now you can rent a lovely 1-bedroom apartment in S√∏borg!

The apartments feature an HTH kitchen with white laminate surfaces and Vestfrost appliances, including a refrigerator, microwave, and ceramic cooktop. The bathrooms are equipped with a separate shower, water-saving toilet by Villeroy & Boch, and a Dansani sink.
Shared facilities include an atrium, communal kitchen, lounge, study room, fitness center, and laundry room. Outside, you'll find green spaces for relaxation. title: R√¶kkehus i dette sk√∏nne T√•rnby kvarter.
description:
Bem√¶rk, at billeder og plantegning ikke er fra denne bolig, som er sat til salg, men en som er sammenlignelig i samme kompleks..

Et ny bygget omr√•de i blandt hyggelige eksisterende boliger ‚Äì som giver en helhed til omr√•det.

I kan nu komme til at bo i et dejligt og meget indbydende r√¶kkehus, hvor nabo skabet og hygge med hinanden er h√∏js√¶det. B√∏rnene kan l√∏be rundt og lege med hinanden og de voksne kan tage en kop kaffe p√• de forskellige terrasser, som hvert r√¶kkehus har.

Dette r√¶kkehus ligger i den r√¶kke, hvor du har sol det meste af dagen. S√• her vil du kunne nyde din have med et koldt glas vin.

Selve r√¶kkehuset har en god entre med h√∏jt til loftet ‚Äì som giver en rigtig fin dimension til huset. Et fint toilet med h√•rde hvidevarer, hvor man i dette r√¶kkehus, har udvidet toilettet til ind under trappen, s√• der er ekstra plads til evt. pusle plads mm.. Fint hvidt k√∏kken, som er formet som et L og adskiller stuen og k√∏kkenet med en rigtig fin og stor spiseplads. Du har adgang til terrassen fra stuen og k√∏kkenet. 1. sal har et dejligt badev√¶relse med en god bruseniche samt et stort for√¶ldre sovev√¶relse og 2 gode b√∏rnev√¶relser. Terrassen har en super fin st√∏rrelse, hvor der er god plads til at sidde ude og nyde sommeren.

En vigtig ting, at bem√¶rke, er at r√¶kkehuset har status som en ejerlejlighed, hvorfor der er f√¶llesudgifter, som blandt andet indeholder bygningsforsikring mm. Endvidere er en stor parkeringsplads til hele bebyggelsen.

title: Beautifully furnished private room in amazing shared apartment with CPR!üè†
description:
*** Beautiful room with CPR registration***

Become part of a vibrant community of young professionals and live stress-free in a spacious shared apartment! üíÜ

We have a beautiful brightly-lid private room available in our fully furnished and serviced co-living apartment called ‚ÄòTrianglen‚Äô.

üè∞The apartment:

This lovely home has in total 5 bedrooms, a big open kitchen, dining area, living room, a bathroom and an additional guest toilet. The unique feature of this apartment is definitely the location on the Lakes and in the middle of buzzing √òsterbro.

üõåThe room:

The room is fully furnished with beautiful Nordic design. It includes everything you need for comfortable living: a big bed of 140X200 (including duvets, pillows and bed linen), a desk with a chair, a big closet (with hangers and shelves), storage units under the bed, laundry basket, lamps, plants and other decorations. 

üó∫Ô∏èThe location:

The apartment is located at the head of the famous Copenhagen Lakes, which is a perfect area for a relaxing stroll. Stop at one of the coffee bars, or rent a pedal boat at the Dronningen Louises bridge. The Lakes are also ideal for runners, run around 1 or more Lakes, depending on your energy level;)

üìúOur prices are all inclusive and give you:

- rent, water, electricity
- high speed internet
- beautiful design furniture 
- 3 times per week cleaning
- biweekly linen change 
- shared common supplies (toiletpaper, soap, cooking oil etc.) 

So everything is ready for you to just move in with your suitcase and stay as long as you wish.

The room is perfect for an individual who wants to live stress-free in a nice and clean furnished home with like minded people and have flexible rental terms. The contract renews automatically every month and you can stay as long as you want. 

We hold an interview by phone or video call with each applicant, ensuring compatibility with our concept and mutual respect for each other.

üåç As a member you get access to a wider community of young professionals that live in our apartments in Copenhagen and in other cities (Berlin, Munich, Vienna, Paris, London etc.). Community members enjoy shared events and even the possibility of a temporary room swap with members in other cities.

We look forward to meeting you!

description:
Hey hey!

The room in this apartment is part of us. We are a coliving operator that focuses on providing flexible housing for young professionals. We have over 80 beautiful apartments to choose from. All apartments are fully furnished and equipped, so you can literally move in with your suitcase. 

Please be aware that the photos are an example of one of our rooms. 

Our room prices start at 6800 kr. and include the following:

- Rent
- Utilities (gas, water, electricity)
- Furniture
- Wireless internet
- Cleaning service
- CPR registration
- Access to the community

The minimum contract duration is 3 months and you can stay as long as you want with only a 1-month termination notice.

People that live with are generally between 25 and 35 and all working professionals. We have an active community and host regular events where you get to expand your network in the city. 

We would be happy to get in touch and help you find your perfect home in Copenhagen.

If you have questions then feel free to reach out via Boligportal. 

Warm regards, 
Davis

description:
*** Beautiful room with CPR registration***

Become part of a vibrant community of young professionals and live stress-free in a spacious shared apartment! üíÜ

We have a beautiful and brightly-lit private room available in our fully furnished and serviced co-living apartment in the middle of the city centre called ‚ÄòStr√∏get 1‚Äô.

This lovely home is located on the 1st floor. There are in total 4 bedrooms, a shared open kitchen with big dining table and a cosy living room with a home cinema setup. There is 1 shared bathrooms.

üõåThe room:

The room (room 1 on the floor plan) is fully furnished with beautiful Nordic design. It includes everything you need for comfortable living: a big bed of 140X200 (including duvets, pillows and bed linen), a desk with a chair, a big closet (with hangers and shelves), storage units under the bed, laundry basket, lamps, plants and other decorations. The room is suitable single  occupancy only.

üó∫Ô∏èThe location:

This apartment is located in the middle of the city centre and is right on one of the most famous shopping streets of Copenhagen. 

üìúOur prices are all-inclusive and give you:

- beautiful design furniture 
- 2 times per week cleaning
- biweekly linen change 
- shared common supplies (toilet paper, soap, cooking oil etc.) 

So everything is ready for you to just move in with your suitcase and stay as long as you wish.

The room is perfect for an individual who wants to live stress-free in a nice and clean furnished home with like-minded people and have flexible rental terms. The contract renews automatically every month, and you can stay as long as you want. 

We hold an interview by phone or video call with each applicant, ensuring compatibility with our concept and mutual respect for each other.

üåç As a member you get access to a wider community of young professionals that live in our apartments in Copenhagen and in other cities (Berlin, Munich, Vienna, Paris, London etc.). title: Fed 1-v√¶relses lejlighed i R√∏dovre!
description:
LEJ EN BOLIG MED T√ÖRNUDSIGT
Helt s√¶rligt har du nu mulighed for at leje en af de helt unikke et- eller tov√¶relses lejeboliger i et af t√•rnene, som er kendetegnet for R√∏dovre Port. Udsigten er ikke til at st√• for. Du vil kunne se K√∏benhavns t√•rne og spir lige s√• vel, som du vil kunne se ud over R√∏dovre og omegn. Boligerne er med sine store vinduespartier lyse og venlige med moderne k√∏kken og bad. Nogle af boligerne har egen altan, og alle har adgang til en stor f√¶lles tagterrasse.

HER KOMMER DU NEMT TIL ALT
R√∏dovre Port er et nyere boligomr√•de med egen g√•gade lige ved R√∏dovre Station. G√•gaden bliver et hyggeligt str√¶de med supermarked, caf√©er og butikker. Tog og bus venter p√• dig lige ude foran din hovedd√∏r, og hvis du √∏nsker en parkeringsplads til en bil eller cykler, s√• er der ogs√• t√¶nkt over det. Nemmere bliver det ikke at komme til alt.

R√òDOVRE PORT ER DESIGNET TIL DIG OG MIG

LYST OG VENLIGT
R√∏dovre Port er et meget ambiti√∏st og arkitektonisk flot boligomr√•de, som er tegnet af Arkitema. De lyse og gyldne farver, som g√•r gennem hele projektet, skaber et lyst, venligt og varmt omr√•de med b√•de lejeboliger, butikker og kontorer. Boligejendommene har et meget varieret udtryk med altaner og f√¶lles tagterrasser, der prydes med gr√∏nne planter, som bryder facaderne og g√∏r hele boligomr√•det mere organisk og foranderligt, designet til dig og mig.

CAFEER OG GR√òNNE PLADSER
R√∏dovre Port er bundet sammen af et gennemg√•ende str√¶de, som prydes med tr√¶er, flotte plantekasser, bel√¶gninger, siddekasser, trapper og forskellige gr√∏nne opholdsomr√•der. 

Lejeboliger i h√∏j kvalitet

Alle boligerne er beliggende i henholdsvis F-t√•rnet og G-bygningen med en enest√•ende udsigt. Boligerne er lyse og venlige med store vinduespartier, som giver et godt lysindfald. Boligerne er velindrettede, og mange har egen altan. Alle boligerne har derudover adgang til en f√¶lles tagterrasse beliggende i F-t√•rnet.

NYD DET NYE K√òKKEN
K√∏kkenet er i flot hvidt design fra HTH med fine rene linjer og en tynd sort kant p√• bordpladen, som understreger k√∏kkenets enkle udtryk. Der er 3 overskabe med l√•ger, underskab med udtr√¶ksskuffer og et vaskeskab. Enkelte boliger har yderligere et kl√¶deskab. Derudover er der 2 glaskeramiske kogeplader samt k√∏leskab med fryseboks.

G√Ö GLAD I BAD
Badev√¶relset er lyst og venligt med flotte hvide fliser p√• gulvet og i brusenichen. Badev√¶relset er derudover indrettet med v√¶gh√¶ngt toilet, h√•ndvask, spejl og glashylde.

F√ÜLLESFACILITETER OGS√Ö TIL DIG
N√•r du lejer en et- eller tov√¶relses lejebolig i R√∏dovre Port har du adgang til en r√¶kke f√¶llesfaciliteter. Project Radio on Gyngemose Parkvej in S√∏borg, formerly known as DR's TV-Byen, has been transformed into an attractive residential area with modern 1-bedroom apartments. No student ID is required to rent these units ‚Äì they are available to everyone.

Shared facilities include an atrium, communal kitchen, lounge, study room, fitness center, and laundry room. Outside, you'll find green spaces for relaxation. I rent a beautiful room (for one person only) in my apartment right by Forum metro station.

The entire apartment is 140 m2, renovated and has plank floors, high ceilings and big windows, allowing for plenty of natural light and a spacious feel. title: KUN 1 M√ÖNEDS DEPOSITUM - Delevenlig 5 v√¶relses lejlighed
description:

For enden af fordelingsgangen finder du depotrummet, som med fordel kan bruges til walk-in, hvis dette foretr√¶kkes. Fra gangen har du ydermere adgang til et separat toilet og badev√¶relse, som er opf√∏rt i et tidl√∏st l√¶kkert design, rummeligt og med separat bruseniche og hertil b√•de med vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler. I det store lyse k√∏kken-alrum finder du et l√¶kkert fuldt udstyret k√∏kken med k√∏le-/fryseskab, ovn, kogeplader, emh√¶tte og opvaskemaskine samt god opbevaringsplads. Stuen er godt indrettet med optimale anvendelsesmuligheder, hvor der veludnyttet kan etableres b√•de en sofa- og spiseafdeling. Fra stuen er der ligeledes adgang til lejlighedens sidste v√¶relse - det store, rummelige sovev√¶relse. Stuen munder ud i en stor sydvendt altan, hvor sol og frisk luft kan nydes og hvor du har kig ud over det n√¶rliggende villaomr√•de.

 Banehaverne er tegnet af det prisvindende arkitektfirma Sweco Architects, som har √∏nsket at skabe en ejendom med fokus p√• f√¶llesskab og livskvalitet.

 Omr√•det omkring Banehaverne byder p√• en harmonisk blanding af natur, kultur og byliv.

Her er storsl√•et natur ved b√•de vand og skov, gode skoler og daginstitutioner samt et v√¶ld af fritidstilbud inden for b√•de friluftsliv, idr√¶t og kreative aktiviteter.

Alt sammen er med til at skabe de bedste foruds√¶tninger for en hverdag, der glider nemt og er rig p√• sjove og sp√¶ndende muligheder.

Banehaverne nyder godt af deres strategiske placering t√¶t p√• K√∏benhavn. Med kun 10 min. gang til Glostrup Station og nem adgang til motorvejsnetv√¶rket er K√∏benhavn t√¶t p√•. Du kan nyde godt af den korte afstand til K√∏benhavn, mens du stadig kan tr√¶kke dig tilbage til den rolige atmosf√¶re i Glostrup/Br√∏ndby om aftenen.

description:

Enjoy the Copenhagen sunset from the large balcony and swim in the fresh harbor water. Large kitchen/family room with a huge living room. A third room can be established in the corner of the living room if you wish.

Stor stue med moderne m√∏bler, spisestue med et stort bord til 8 g√¶ster, 1 sovev√¶relse med dobbeltseng, rummeligt badev√¶relse med badekar, lyst spisek√∏kken med opvaskemaskine, komfur, ovn, mikro, k√∏l og frys. Attractive and very comfortable fully furnished apartment for rent for 3 months from October 1, 2024 in N√¶rum and within walking distance to public transportation. Lovely living room with lots of sun and light, overlooking the 9m2 terrace facing southwest and the garden area. Sun all afternoon. Separate dining area. One bedroom with double bed, bathroom with shower and bathtub, spacious kitchen with eating area, dishwasher, fridge, freezer, microwave and stove with oven. toaster, and pots, pans and dishes for 8 people. Laundry room in the building. Elevator (lift). Free parking, also for guests. Four supermarkets within 5 -8 minutes walking distance. Bus connections and local train 8 minutes walking. title: Amazing space for a single or couple in Co-living
description:
Live in a beautiful, fully furnished apartment together with awesome people from all over the world. The apartment is operated by co-living apartments company. 

The price includes everything: 3 times weekly cleaning, shared common supplies, internet, towels & linens and beautiful Hay furnishing. Everything is ready for you to just move in with your suitcase and stay as long as you wish. 

There are two bathrooms with showers. The kitchen is big and spacious with lots of natural light coming in, making it an ideal place for cooking big shared dinners.

Built in 1908, this large five room apartment contains two couples rooms and three single rooms making it perfect for up to seven members. Adorned with gorgeous crown moulding, furniture by Hay Design, an eat-in kitchen and two bathrooms that boast either a full shower or a large soaking tub; Glyp is a luxuriously spacious home in the middle of central Copenhagen. Be social, be central and be happy in your new home at The Glyp. The apartment is next to the famous Glypoteket Museum, which can be seen from the window of the apartment. The water front, great for swimming, chilling, exercise, or going for walks, is only a five minutes away. 

And if living in here wasn't fun enough, all members of this apartment will have free access to the famous amusement park Tivoli next doors. So you can choose if you want to enjoy their excellent concerts from your apartment or front row.

title: Cosy Villa +Garden community seeks new member
description:
We are two people (1M/1F), a one-eyed cat and an empty room that might have your name on it ;) We are both around 30 y/o, and looking for someone respectful, friendly and tidy to join our hyggelig home. 

The vacant room is 10m2, with an inbuilt 140cm bed, and additional furniture is available but optional. It is on the first floor and has a window facing west towards the park on the other side of the road.

The house is 183m2 spread over three floors, with a large kitchen and living room, 2 bathrooms, a laundry room, 2 extra rooms, a south-facing terrace, a pergola and a 500m2 permaculture garden. 

It is located in Amager's central villakvarter, a short walk to Sundbyvesterplads/ Amagerbrogade, and 10 minutes by bike to central Copenhagen, Amager strand, and Vesterbro's meatpacking district, and an 8 minute drive to the airport. The nearest metro stations are Sundby (M1) and Amager Strand (M2).

We have two rooms becoming available this summer, so we are going from 4 to 2, but the two of us left, Anders and Mo, are a mixture of international and Danish (although we prefer to speak English), and like to create a cosy atmosphere in the home, where there is plenty of space for both socialising, working on projects, and relaxing in peace ‚Äì and the occasional party. The photos are outdated, meaning there are several renovations in the kitchen and garden, with a greenhouse currently under construction too, all of which can be seen when we organize a viewing. 

We are looking for someone who wants to join a home and not just rent a room, who can clean up after themselves, communicate respectfully, and help create a nice atmosphere. Long-term rentals are preferable. We are open to pets, but as mentioned Mo has a cat called Belly, so they will have to get along. Move in as soon as possible. 

Please write a bit about yourself in your application, and we'll get back to you for a meet up and tour if we think you could be a good fit.
address: 11. juni, Irlandsvej, 2300 K√∏benhavn, K√∏benhavn S

title: V√¶relse 50 meter fra vandet i Nordhavn
description:

Lejligheden er en perfekt delelejlighed eftersom de to v√¶relser ligger i hver sin ende af lejligheden. Boligen indeholder stor entre med indbyggede skabe med god plads til overt√∏jet. Fra entreen er der adgang til et v√¶relse med indbygget skab og til et stort walk-in closet. 

Lejligheden har en stor lys stue i √•ben forbindelse med k√∏kkenet, hvorfra der er panoramaudsigt til Hamborg Plads. Den brede vindueskarm g√∏r, at man kan sidde ved vinduet og f√∏lge med i livet p√• Hamborg Plads. 

K√∏kkenet har mange skabe og skuffer og er udstyret med Quooker, opvaskemaskine, stort induktionskomfur, ovn og mikroovn og har en l√¶kker corian bordplade. Bag k√∏kkenet ligger sovev√¶relset, hvorfra der er udgang til √∏stvendt altan med morgensol. 

Badev√¶relset har flotte gr√• fliser og separat bruseniche og et stort badev√¶relsesm√∏bel med fire skuffer. Badev√¶relset er udstyret med rainshower samt vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler. 

Der er naturligvis gulvvarme og ventilationsanl√¶g i lejligheden s√• der er altid et godt indeklima.

Ejendommen har to store f√¶lles tagterrasser som er m√∏bleret med eksklusive stole og borde, loungem√∏bler, planter og to store gasgrill. Ejendommen har ogs√• en hyggelig lukket g√•rd samt cykkelrum. Ejendommen har ligeledes to m√∏blerede overnatningsrum til g√¶ster og et rum hvor man kan l√•ne v√¶rkt√∏j mv. 

Der er gode parkeringsmuligheder i P-huset t√¶t ved lejligheden ligesom offentlig transport i form af metro, tog og bus er inden for r√¶kkevidde. 

Lejligheden ligger t√¶t p√• vandet og det nye flydende foreningshus, hvor der er sauna samt bade og kajakfaciliteter. F√¶lledparken, kastellet og Langelinie er oplagte lokationer til en god g√• eller l√∏betur.

Der ligger mange gode butikker i Nordhavn s√•som Meny, Netto, Letz Sushi, John & Woo, Restaurant Silo, Kini Kini, Korean Bbq, Garbanzo, Olioli, Jagger Burger, Corsa Pizza, Original Coffee, bageri, ismageri samt Big Bio mv.

title: Monoma Campus CPH Gentofte ‚Äì Section 2
description:
Student/youth accommodation in Gentofte, 3 km (15 min by bike) from DTU in Lyngby and 20 min by train from Copenhagen city center.

Furnished rooms 22 - 25 sqm (approx. 40 sqm gross) with your private bathroom and access to shared kitchen, dining area and laundry facilities.
DKK 6,500 per month utilities and shared internet included. When moving in you pay 3 months' rent as a deposit + first month upfront. 
Each room has a private balcony (approx. 4 sqm) and the residence is located in beautiful green surroundings with good opportunities for a run or bike ride nearby. Take a short trip to Lyngby, where you find lots of city life with shopping, cafes, cinema, fitness and much more. 
In summer you reach the best beaches on the √òresund coast line by bike. 
Nearby you will also find Bernstoffparken, with Bernstorff castle and the beautiful Bernstorff garden, great for a run or walk.

(NB! Room furniture can deviate from photos)

description:

This rental is short term with maximum of 10 months period and can not be extended. So this apartment is for mostly for expads or you who are looking for something temporary.

The famous and colorful street in √òsterbro, Copenhagen is located 5 minutes from the central Copenhagen. Across the street you will find busses and the metro that in 5 minutes will take you to the city center.

title: Veldisponeret 3-v√¶relses i Kirkebjerg
description:

Alle lejligheder er velindrettede, stilrene og moderne med flotte lysindfald, hvorfor I her kan finde en bolig, der matcher jeres √∏nsker.

Kirkebjerg er et nyt omr√•de i Br√∏ndby√∏ster, som er i rivende udvikling. N√¶rheden til Glostrup Station er bare √©n af mange fordele, og i 2025 er der planer om, at omr√•det f√•r eget letbanestop. Fem minutter fra bebyggelsen folder Br√∏ndby Strandpark sig ud, og det syv kilometer lange natur- og friluftsomr√•de med sandstrand, klitter, enge, overdrev og skov bliver et herligt fristed. English:
Large, lovely 3-room residence with 2 spacious rooms, a living room connected to an open kitchen, a beautiful bathroom, and a large, south-facing balcony with a fantastic view.

The apartment is located on the 3rd floor at the corner/gable of a modern property centrally on Islands Brygge. It is well distanced from all neighbors and has a lovely view of a green wedge, plenty of sky, and the water of Copenhagen's canals while being set back enough that the lively atmosphere of Brygge does not disturb.

Upon entering the apartment, you step into a spacious hallway with room for outerwear. From there, you have access to a large living area that serves as both a dining and living room. The kitchen is in open connection with the living area and is equipped with a large kitchen island and all necessary appliances. From the living area, there is direct access to a large, covered balcony with furniture and a view of a green area and water. The apartment has two bedrooms; one with built-in closets and both furnished with a bed or sofa bed. The bathroom is large and spacious, tiled with two separate sinks, cabinet space, and a separate shower niche and washing facilities.

The apartment is located minutes from Islands Brygge Metro Station, Dybbelsbro S-train Station, Fisketorvet Shopping Center, and Copenhagen Central Station. There is also easy access to Islands Brygge harbor and swimming area, restaurants, cafes, supermarkets, gyms, and fitness centers all within walking distance, and easy access to the historical Christianshavn and the inner city via Copenhagen's bicycle bridges. A very short distance away lies Amager F√¶lled, which offers beautiful nature and rich wildlife, ideal for picnics, walks, and runs away from the noise and bustle of city life. With Amager F√¶lled's extensive trail system, there is a short distance to, among other places, DR-Byen and the University of Copenhagen.

The property features an open green courtyard with a playground. There is an elevator in the building. The area around the apartment has ample parking opportunities. The apartment is rented out furnished with various kitchen utensils, tableware, etc., and is ready to move into. Internet is included in the rent, while water and heating are paid on account. Other utility expenses such as electricity are not included in the rent. Contact for a viewing today.

 Den rummelige bolig byder p√• et stort k√∏kken-alrum, der flyder sammen med en lys stue forsynet med imponerende gulv-til-loft vinduer og adgang til en hyggelig 4 m2 altan med karnap.

Lejligheden er udstyret med designer m√∏bler fra Pausian og Hay og topkvalitets materialer som Dinesen Douglas-gulve, Poggenpohl k√∏kken, Philippe Starck badev√¶relsesm√∏bler, B√∏rma armaturer og eksklusive vindueskarme i l√¶rketr√¶. 

Beliggende kun 10 minutters k√∏rsel fra lufthavnen, og en kort g√•tur fra metroen, Dyb√∏lsbro Station og Fisketorvet med et v√¶ld af butikker og en biograf. Omr√•det er i rivende udvikling og tilbyder trendy shoppingmuligheder lige ved en kanal, der l√∏ber ud i K√∏benhavns havn. St√∏jgener er ikke-eksisterende, da lejligheden ikke gr√¶nser op til en vej. Nyd udsigten til Amager F√¶lled, et ideelt sted for l√∏beture eller lange spadsereture, og i sommerm√•nederne, en levende atmosf√¶re med strand og havnebad kun fem minutters gang v√¶k. ENGLISH 
Discover this stylish designer apartment with a ceiling height of 3.5 meters, built in 2006 by Schmidt Hammer Lassen - the same architects behind The Black Diamond. 

This spacious home features a large kitchen-dining area that seamlessly extends into a bright living room with impressive floor-to-ceiling windows and access to a cozy 4 m¬≤ balcony with a bay window. 

The bathroom is both spacious and functional, equipped with a shower area, washing column, and a large wall-to-wall mirror. 

An 8 sqm basement storage room is included. 

The property offers private parking on a first-come, first-served basis, with a parking card and boom operation available for rent at 300 DKK per month. 

The apartment is fitted with designer furniture from Pausian and Hay, and high-quality materials like Dinesen Douglas floors, a Poggenpohl kitchen, Philippe Starck bathroom fixtures, B√∏rma fittings, and exquisite larch window sills. 

Located just a 10-minute drive from the airport, and a short walk from the metro, Dyb√∏lsbro Station, and Fisketorvet with a plethora of shops and a cinema. The area is rapidly developing and offers trendy shopping options right by a canal leading into Copenhagen's harbor. There are no noise disturbances as the apartment does not adjoin a road. Enjoy the view of Amager F√¶lled, an ideal place for running or long walks, and during the summer months, a vibrant atmosphere with a beach and sea bath just a five-minute walk away. 

An apartment and area that are hard to resist.

Contact us for an appointment to see the apartment.

title: Room in a nice villa near S-train and city Copenhagen
description:
Our nice house is at the end of a quiet street. Located in Virum Center. 
- Only 5 mins walking distance to the 'Virum' S-train station, 10 mins by bike to DTU, and 15 mins by train or car to central Copenhagen.
- Just walk 2 mins to restaurants, supermarkets, cafes, beautiful lakes, forests, and parks. 

The room is about 8m2 and for only one person, in a quiet neighborhood. It's a light, beautiful room with floor heating. It's furnished and has everything you need for working, studying and relaxing.

The kitchen, toilet, and laundry room are shared with us. 
We are a small family. We also have a calm dog, so you naturally have to be okay with the dog's presence.
 
The room is ready for move-in. The rent is including utilities (water, heat, electricity, and internet). 2-month deposit. CPR registration is available.
 
So if the room seems interesting, please write us a little about you: who are you? What do you do for work/study and hobbies? What do you like about the house? Any previous experience with living in shared accommodations? 

We are looking forward to hearing from you soon.

title: Stunning apartment with amazing water view
description:
Available from: 1/10-2024

This is one of the best water views over Copenhagen. This 6th floor apartment offers a generous 93 m2 living space split in two bedrooms, a hallway, an open kitchen and living room and one large bathroom. 

A high quality kitchen with Gaggenau kitchen hardware, Dombracht fixtures in the bath and quality hard wood floors To top it all off you have floor to ceiling windows that brings you to your combined 29 m2 balcony with planted flower beds that are automatically watered by a clever rainwater reuse system. You will find access to the balcony from all living rooms of the apartment. 

The building has been awarded with one of the highest climate certifications, DGNB Gold. 

Surrounding the building you will find plenty of shops, restaurants, play areas and a beach that is one of the hidden treasures of Copenhagen in the summer months. 

We are renting the apartment out 1-2 year with possibility for extension.

Feel free to reach out in case you would like some more information.

E N G E L S K

Nice apartment in an attractive property on 2 levels of 120 sqm. is for sublease for a minimum of 1 month and a maximum of 7 months.

The apartment is available in the period from 01 October 2024 - 30 April 2025

Do you need an apartment in beautiful surroundings in Gentofte Municipality for a shorter or longer period, min. 1 month and max. 7 months. Is this the right apartment, and you only need to bring your personal items, as the apartment contains everything in household goods, bed linen, etc.

There are also free parking options at the property with space for several cars.

The average rent is DKK 19,900 plus consumption of water + heat + electricity.
There is free internet and TV signal

The apartment is rented for a period of minimum 1 month, and max. 7 months depending on agreement, and will be suitable for Danish/Foreign companies, for use by staff, embassies, as well as families who have their home renovated and who need a replacement home. etc. for a shorter period.

The apartment is located in Gentofte, on a pleasant residential street, within walking distance to Gentofte S√∏ & Nymosen. The property has a view of the city and is close to Greater Copenhagen. By S-train to Stork√∏behavn in 17 minutes.

In the kitchen there is a stove, dishwasher, microwave, coffee machine, fridge/freezer, as well as all cutlery etc.

The apartment is fully furnished, and there is also a large flat screen TV with Netflix, Disney + Rakuten, etc.

In the bedrooms there are 2 large double beds, + cot and high chair 0-2 years.

There is also an extra sofa bed with room for 2 people on the 2nd floor.
There are therefore sleeping places for a total of up to max. 6. persons

In the living room there are 2 leather sofas, sideboard, lamps, coffee table and much more.

In the dining room there is a dining table with 6 chairs, wardrobe etc.

The apartment is located in a beautiful property with half-timbered buildings, and high ceilings with an area of ‚Äã‚Äãapprox. 120 sq m. in 2 floors,.

As I said, the apartment is fully furnished and is ready to move into.
All you need is your personal belongings.

The apartment is available from 01 October 2024 and is rented for a period of at least 1 month. and max. 7 months

The apartment is on 2 levels, (1 + 2 floor), and has an all-time view of Gentofte and the surrounding area.

S-Train and buses are only a few minutes' walk away. Several supermarkets in the area as well as several nurseries, kindergartens and several schools.

Distance to Gentofte Hospital, less than 2 km. Lyngby DTU, approx. 5 km.

Copenhagen is 9 km from Gentofte, and Kastrup airport 16 km. from the property.

Are you looking for a comfortable place to stay during the working days of the week? We are offering a furnished room for a commuter who needs a place to stay from Monday to Thursday. The room has new floors and is spacious with dimensions of 6x4.8 meters, and the bathroom has been newly renovated with a tub and a low shower.
Both the room and the bathroom have sloping walls and are located on the first floor. You will have access to a common kitchen that is shared with the landlord, as well as to a lovely garden where you can relax and enjoy nature.
The house is situated in beautiful surroundings in Vallensb√¶k Landsby, which adds an extra charm to your experience. There are good transport options right outside the door with bus number 143/144, which makes it easy to get to and from work. Please note that the landlord has a dog, so it is important that you are comfortable with pets.
We offer a friendly and quiet environment, perfect for someone who commutes for work. If you are looking for a nice place to stay during the weekdays, this room is the ideal choice.

title: High end penthouse apartment in the heart of Copenhagen
description:
Exclusive luxury penthouse apartment in the heart of Copenhagen.

125 square meter apartment with an extra 90 square meter private rooftop terrace.

2 bedrooms with king and queen size beds in each room.


Living room & Kitchen:
Lounge area
70" smart TV
Kitchen & dining area
All kitchen utensils & appliances

Microwave

Kingsize bed

Double bed
30" smart TV
Mini fridge

Toilet

Dryer

Rooftop terrace:
Lounge area
Dining area
Kitchen, gas grill & fridge

Whole apartment:
Air conditioning

There are restaurants, cafes, bars, nightclubs and shopping opportunities all over the area, All of central Copenhagen is within walking distance from the apartment.

- 10 minutes to the city central square (r√•dhuspladsen) and the main walking street.
- 10 minutes to the Copenhagen canals.
- 5 minutes to the nearest shopping mall and cinema.
- 3 minutes to the nearest metro station.
- 5 minutes to the Copenhagen central station.

There are parking spots on the street at the apartment.

Vesterbro is one of the most energetic and developing parts of copenhagen with a great vibe and lots of restaurants, cafes, bars and nightclubs etc.


Accept the house rules and the terms and conditions prior to booking:


¬∑ Any form of subleasing is not allowed.

¬∑ The apartment is used as it is, ie. as it appears and is used by the owner. It is not allowed to drill holes, paint or to do any other type of customization to the property.

¬∑ A maximum of 4 people are allowed to stay at the apartment.

¬∑ It is not allowed to hold events or any kind of parties in the apartment or anywhere on the property. (Breaking the rules will result in immediate termination of the leasing period without a refund and you will be fined)

¬∑ The apartment must be treated gently, considerately and carefully.

¬∑ No smoking or wearing shoes inside the apartment, No loud noise from 23:00 to 08:00.

¬∑ The wardrobe in the master bedroom is locked and may not be opened or used.
(There is a big wardrobe available in the guest room)

¬∑ All entrances must be closed and locked and all the lights must be turned off at all times when leaving the apartment.

¬∑ All damaged and missing things and furniture as well as any kind of damage to the apartment is fully compensated by the tenant.

¬∑ The apartment must be handed over completely cleaned and tidied when the rental period ends.
Offers a professional cleaning for an additional fee of 1000 DKK.

¬∑ The tenant is required to read, fill and sign a private leasing contract stating the agreement of the house rules, security deposit, rent and rental period.
